GSP33bbdip13u:3: tatra cānyatra ca prasiddhānāṃ śabdānāṃ viṣṇau samanvayaṃ prāyeṇāsmin pāde darśayati / viṣṇoḥ paravidyāviṣayatvamuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:5: etatpādapratipādyaṃ darśayati - tatreti // anyonyasamuccaye caśabdau / devatādhikaraṇāpaśūdrādhikaraṇayoḥ samanvayākaraṇāttadvyāvṛttyarthaṃ - 'prāyeṇa';
GSP33bbdip13u:6: prācuryeṇeti / tathā ca prāyeṇāsmin tṛtīye pāde 'tatra';
GSP33bbdip13u:8: rudraprakṛtyādau ca śrutiliṅgādibhiḥ prasiddhānāṃ nāmaliṅgātmakaśabdānāṃ viṣṇau 'samanvayaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:10: pratipādayati sūtrakṛdityarthaḥ / śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayavākyamudāhṛtya viṣayasaṃśayasayuktikapūrvapakṣān darśayati - viṣṇoriti /
GSP33bbdip13u:13: tatra 'yasmin dyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣamotaṃ manaḥ saha prāṇaiśca sarvaiḥ tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānam';
GSP33bbdip13u:21_1: ubhayānvayī / rudrasyeti śeṣe ṣaṣṭī / tayorityetat pradhānavāyvorapyupalakṣakam /
GSP33bbdip13u:21_2: tathā ca adṛśyatvādiguṇakākṣarasya viṣṇoḥ paravidyāviṣayatvaṃ yatroktaṃ tatraivātharvaṇe
GSP33bbdip13u:22: yasmin dyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣamotaṃ manaḥ saha prāṇaiśca sarvaiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:25: ityatra iti vākye tatra dyubhvādyāśraye uktamityekā yojanā / tatra dyubhvādyāyatanatve 'tayoḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:27_0: atravākye dyubhvādyāyatane prāṇādhāratvapratīteḥ śravaṇāt / tathā sa eṣa iti jīvaliṅgaśravaṇācca /
GSP33bbdip13u:27_1: na ca prāṇādhāratvaśravaṇe 'pi kuto 'tra rudrasya prāptiriti vācyam / 'prāṇānāṃ granthirasi
GSP33bbdip13u:29: yo brahmā brahmaṇa ujjabhāra prāṇeśvaraḥ kṛttivāsāḥ pinākīr /
GSP33bbdip13u:31_0: ityādikhilasaṃhitāvākyena ca rudrasya prāṇādhāratvapratīteḥ ityaparā yojanā / yadvā
GSP33bbdip13u:32: iti vākyagrāhī / evaṃ tatra tayoḥ prāptiriti dūrānvayena 'tatra';
GSP33bbdip13u:33: paravidyāviṣayatve tayo rudrajīvayoḥ prāptirityanyā yojanā / tatra ādyayojanāyāṃ dyubhvādyāyatanatvasya viṣṇvanyatvākṣepamukhena 'tamevam';
GSP33bbdip13u:35_1: prādhānyena jñeyatvarūpasya vā paravidyāviṣayatvasya pūrvoktasya viṣṇoritaratvākṣepāt
GSP33bbdip13u:35_3: viṣayaḥ darśitaḥ / dvividhadvitīyayojanāyāṃ sayuktikapūrvapakṣo darśitaḥ / tṛtīyāyāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:42: rudra u mā āviśa iti padacchedaḥ / u ityavyayaṃ sambuddhidyotako nipātaḥ / mā ityavyayaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:43: nāsmadādeśaḥ māśabdaḥ / yadvā metyanenāsmadādeśo māśabdaścetyubhau tantreṇopāttau / sa ca niṣedhārthaḥ / tathā ca - he rudra tvaṃ 'prāṇānām';
GSP33bbdip13u:48: praviśa mayi sannidhiṃ kurvityarthaḥ / yadvā - he rudra antakastvaṃ māṃ mā praviśetyarthaḥ / 'tena';
GSP33bbdip13u:55: puṣṇātviti śrutyantarārthaḥ / siddhānte tu rudrādiśabdāḥ viṣṇuparāḥ / ya eṣa jīvo 'bahudhā';
GSP33bbdip13u:69: siddhāntayatsūtramavatārya vyācaṣṭe - ata iti // sautrasvaśabdasya svaśabdaparyāyātmaśabdāditi viṣṇutattvanirṇayokteḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:70: svetiśabdaḥ svaśabda iti vyutpattyā svaśabdaparyāyātmaśabdagrāhitvaṃ viṣṇoḥ svarūpasyaiva sākṣādvācako hyayamātmaśabda iti tattvapradīpokteḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:71: svasya viṣṇoreva vācakaḥ śabdaḥ svaśabda iti vigrahāśrayeṇa ca ātmaśabdaparāmarśitvamāśritya svaśabdādityetadātmaśabdāditi vyākhyātam / tathā ca 'ityātmaśabdāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:76: ātmāśabdādapi kuto 'yaṃ viṣṇurityata āha - ātmeti // yasmāt 'taiḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:81_0: na mukhyato vācakatvena prāpnuvantītyarthaḥ / anenātmaśabdasyāpi guṇapūrtirartha
GSP33bbdip13u:81_1: ityuktaṃ bhavati / brahmavaivarta ityanantaramanyatra niravakāśatayoktāditi śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:89_0: nanu viṣṇau mukhyo 'pyātmaśabdo jāyamānatvarūpajīvaliṅgabalādamukhyārthaḥ kiṃ na
GSP33bbdip13u:89_1: syāt / tathā ca na tato viṣṇordyubhvādyāyatanatvanirṇaya ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya
GSP33bbdip13u:89_3: sūtre dyubhvādyāyatanasyeti vipariṇāmena anuvartanīyam / muktopasṛpyeti bhāvanirdeśaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:89_4: upasṛpyatvaṃ ceha śrautasetuśabdabalātprāpyāntararahitatve sati prāpyatvaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP33bbdip13u:105: nanu dyubhvādyāyatanasya muktaprāpyatvaṃ kutaḥ viṣṇutvaniścāyakamityāśaṅkāparihārakatayāpi sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - brahmaviditi // 'ityādinā';
GSP33bbdip13u:107_0: viṣṇoḥ evetyanena prāpyatvaṃ prāpyāntararahitatve sati prāptatvam / anena dyubhvādyāyatanasya
GSP33bbdip13u:107_3: sūcitam / upasṛpyapadaṃ bhāvapradhānaṃ kṛtvā vyākhyātam / evakāro liṅgasyānyaniṣṭhatvavyavacchedakaḥ / 'brahmavit';
GSP33bbdip13u:110: iti taittirīyopaniṣadi mahopaniṣadi ca śrutam / atra 'tadviśvamupajīvati';
GSP33bbdip13u:115: iti sahasranāmagatamekaṃ nāma / paramā mukhyā gamyata iti gatirāśrayaḥ / 'etam';
GSP33bbdip13u:122: idamidaṃ ceti pratyekaṃ bahunā vacanena 'kiṃ prayojanaṃ'; na kimapi,
GSP33bbdip13u:123: pratyutoktigauravameveti bhāvaḥ / tarhi kathaṃ nirṇaya ityata āha - yāvacchvetamiti / 'śvetaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:126: aparokṣajñānākhyopāyavān mukto na syāt / bhagavadicchārūpāvaraṇānmuktaḥ samyagāvirbhūtajñānānandādimān na bhavediti 'eṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:129_0: tajjanyanirṇayaviṣaya iti vā / bhāvabodhe tu - sūtre purāṇe ca muktapadena liṅgabhaṅgavān
GSP33bbdip13u:129_1: vivakṣita ityuktam / atra śvetadvīpāganturamuktatvoktyā śvetadvīpaṃ prāptasyaiva
GSP33bbdip13u:129_2: muktatvaṃ jñāyate / tathā ca tatsthitasya viṣṇorevetaravyavacchedena muktaprāpyatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:129_3: siddhamiti bhāvaḥ / ityādityapurāṇe ityasya tasyaiva muktaprāpyatvavyapadeśādityanenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:129_4: anena tasyaivetyevakārasyopayogo jñāpito bhavati / asya hetorna liṅgasya sāvakāśatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:138_0: nanu prāguktarītyā rudraprakṛtyordyubhvāyatanatvaṃ kiṃ na syādityatastatsādhakābhāvānna
GSP33bbdip13u:138_1: tayostadityāha sūtrakṛt - nānumānamiti // atra nānumānamiti sādhyāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe -
GSP33bbdip13u:139_0: iti tattvapradīpokteḥ anumānātmake anumānasiddhaprāmāṇyake pāśupatādyāgame sarvāśrayatvena
GSP33bbdip13u:139_1: kalpito bodhita ityarthaḥ / kecittu - pramāṇatvena anumīyata ityanumānamiti vyācikhyuḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:146_0: evaṃ sūtre pratijñāṃśaṃ vyākhyāya hetvaṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - bhasmadhareti // tasya rudrasya
GSP33bbdip13u:147_1: liṅgātmakaśabdasyāpi saṅgrahāya / bhāvabodhe tu - bhasmadharetyanena rudravācakanāmātmakaśabdo
GSP33bbdip13u:147_2: gṛhyate / ugratvapadena ugratvarūpaliṅgātmakaśabdo gṛhyate / ādipadena nāmaliṅgātmakaśabdāntarāṇi
GSP33bbdip13u:147_3: gṛhyante / samākhyāderupalakṣakametat / tathā ca - bhasmadharādirudraśrutīnām ugratvādirūpatalliṅgānāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:148_0: iti vacanādviśeṣanāmābhiprāyeṇa / ata evaitadvacanoktāḥ nagnādiśabdā evādipadena
GSP33bbdip13u:148_2: vyākhyeyam / yadyapi atacchabdādityasya tacchabdābhāvāditi vyākhyāne nañaḥ kriyāsāpekṣatvenāsamarthatvātsamāsānupapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:149: ityavyayībhāvasamāsāśrayaṇānnānupapattiḥ / pañcamītvāt nātrām bhavati / anena sūtre jagatkartṛtvenānumīyate ityanumānaśabdena vā 'ānumānamanumānasambandhi';
GSP33bbdip13u:150_1: rudrapradhānādhikaṃ gṛhyate / yadvā - pramāṇatvenānumīyata ityanumānaṃ pāśupatādyāgamaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:151_1: tatra prathamāṇantarapadenāgama ucyate / dvitīyena pratipādyatvam / tathā ca anumānātmakapāśupatādyāgamapratipādyaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:156: 'so 'ntakaḥ sa rudraḥ sa prāṇabhṛtsa prāṇanāyakaḥ sar iśo yo hariryo 'nanto yo viṣṇuryaḥ parovarīyān';
GSP33bbdip13u:160_1: dyubhvādyātanatvaṃ rudrādeḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha - sa iti // yo 'ntakassaṃhartā
GSP33bbdip13u:160_2: sa eva tacchabdavācyaḥ śrutaḥ sa viṣṇureva / yo rudraḥ śrutaḥ so 'pi viṣṇureva / yaḥ 'prāṇabhṛt';
GSP33bbdip13u:163: tatsvāmī tata eva prāṇeśa śabditaḥ so 'pi viṣṇureva / yar iśaḥ śrutaḥ so 'pi viṣṇureva / yo 'nantastacchabdavācyaḥ so 'pi trividhaparicchedaśūnyatvādviṣṇureva,
GSP33bbdip13u:164: na śeṣaḥ / yaḥ parovarīyān so 'pi rudrādeḥ parato vāṇyādeḥ parādviriñcāt parataḥ prakṛteḥ paratvāddharireva nānya iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:166_0: iti vacanānusāreṇa paraparataravaravaratamānāṃ caturṇāṃ pratyāyanāya vṛttivākye subādeśasya
GSP33bbdip13u:176: tadādhāro yato viṣṇuḥ pinākīti tataḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSP33bbdip13u:182: nanu tathāpi na prāṇādhāratvadyubhvādyāyatanatvabodhakasamākhyāśrutau viṣṇoḥ pratipādyatvaniścayaḥ / tatratyānāṃ rudrādiśabdānāṃ paśupatyādāveva rūḍhatvena viṣṇau tadabhāvāt,
GSP33bbdip13u:183_0: bhāve vā punaraniścayāt / viṣṇau yogavṛttisambhave 'pi tasyā rūḍhito durbalatvenāniścāyakatvāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:183_1: na hi śrutyantare viṣṇuliṅgādyastītyata āha - brahmāṇḍe ceti / co 'pyarthaḥ samuccaye /
GSP33bbdip13u:185: nirvāpayati nivartayati yasmāttasmādrudra ityucyate / ka ityata stadrūpaviśeṣamāha - janārdana iti / jananamardayatīti vyutpattirḥ / 'iśanārt iśānāṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:186: brahmādīnāṃ ceṣṭakatvādīśāno 'pi sa evetyarthaḥ / mahattvata ityupalakṣaṇam / dyotanādeścetyapi draṣṭavyam / ye 'narāḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:191: abhihitaḥ śrutāviti śeṣaḥ / śruta iti pāṭhaḥ svarasaḥ / 'śaṃrodhanāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:192: muktiparyantaṃ svarūpabhūtamapi sukhaṃ rudhvā vartanāt āsurasakhaṃ nirudhya vartanādvā śarva ityarthaḥ / yataḥ 'kṛtyātmakaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:194: sṛjan niyamayan vā tena svātmānaṃ jīvaṃ vā 'vaste';
GSP33bbdip13u:195: ācchādayati tadantarvartate / yadvā - dehaṃ vaste adhivasatītyataḥ kṛttivāsā ityucyata ityarthaḥ / 'virecanāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:196: jagatsarjanādasau viṣṇuḥ bṛṃhaṇādvardhanādvā brahmanāmā / asau paramaiśvaryādindra ityucyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:202: evaṃ viṣṇau rudrādiśabdānāṃ mahāyogamuktvā vidvadrūḍhiṃ cāha - evamiti //
GSP33bbdip13u:204: uktarītyā nānāvidhairnimitaiḥ sapurāṇeṣu vedeṣu gataiḥ etairnānāvidhaiḥ śabdairviṣṇureka eva 'gīyate';
GSP33bbdip13u:206_0: ityābhyāṃ tatropapādakamuktam / tribhuvanārthaśabdavyāpī hi trivikramaḥ / sarvapuruṣaśabdanimittakasvāmī
GSP33bbdip13u:206_1: hi puruṣottamaḥ / tathā cānena viṣṇau rudrādiśabdānāṃ mahāyogavidvadrūḍhikathanāt
GSP33bbdip13u:213: anyanāmnāṃ gatirviṣṇuḥ eka eva prakīrtitaḥ // iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:218_0: ityādiśrutīnāmanirṇāyakatvaṃ ca syādityata āha - vāmane ceti // co 'pyarthe / asyāpyuktatvādavirodhaiti
GSP33bbdip13u:218_1: pūrveṇānvayaḥ / kimuktamityatastadvākyaṃ paṭhati - na tviti / turavadhāraṇe / 'nārāyaṇādīnāṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:219: nārāyaṇa ityādīnamanyatra rudrādau sambhavo mukhyavṛttiḥ astīti śeṣaḥ / 'anyanāmnāṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:221: mukhyavācyaḥ prakīrtita ityarthaḥ / itiśabdasya vāmana ityanenānvayaḥ / tasya nārāyaṇādināmnāṃ anyatra niravakāśatvokteḥ na tacchrutīnāmanirṇāyakatvamiti vivakṣitasādhyenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:226: prādādanyatra bhagavān rājevarte svakaṃ puram // iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:228_1: āha - skānde ceti // co 'pyarthaḥ samuccaye / asyāpyuktatvāditi pūrveṇānvayaḥ / kimuktamityatastadvākyaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:230_0: anyebhyo rudrādibhyaḥ anyāni rudrādināmānītiśeṣaḥ / ādiśabdena viṣṇurityādikaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:230_1: atra dṛṣṭāntamāha - rājeti // yathā rājā svakaṃ puramṛte 'nyadamātyādibhyo dadāti
GSP33bbdip13u:230_2: tadvadityarthaḥ / itītyantasya skānde ityanenānvayaḥ / tasya ca nārāyaṇādināmnāmanyatra
GSP33bbdip13u:230_4: viṣṇorevoktatvānna sāmyamityanvayena pūrvaprayuktaivakārasya kṛtyāntaraṃ sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:234: ugro bhasmadharo nagnaḥ kapālīti śivasya ca /
GSP33bbdip13u:238_0: yadyevaṃ rudrādiśabdāḥ viṣṇvaikaparāḥ tarhi kimucyate bhasmadharogratvādīnāṃ tacchabdatvam /
GSP33bbdip13u:238_1: viṣṇudattatvābhiprāyeṇa cet - tarhi rudrādiśabdā api tādṛśā iti kathaṃ tairnirṇayābhāva
GSP33bbdip13u:238_2: ityata āha - caturmukha iti // yadyapi svakīyāni,
GSP33bbdip13u:245_0: śivāya / castvarthaḥ / brāhma ityasyāpyuktatvāditi pūrveṇānvayaḥ / rudrādau bhasmadharogratvādereva
GSP33bbdip13u:245_1: viṣṇossakāśātprāptatveneti tadarthaḥ / tasya ca pūrvoktaṃ yuktamiti sādhyenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:255: viṣayabhūtalokādhāratvasya 'vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāyaṃ lokaḥ paraśca lokaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti'; (bṛ. 5-7-2.)
GSP33bbdip13u:256_0: iti śrutyantare vāyuniṣṭhatvena prasiddhatvādvāyorvātra prakaraṇe dyubhvādyāśrayatvena
GSP33bbdip13u:256_1: pratipādyatā kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - prāṇabhṛcceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:256_3: pūrvoktahetubhirityarthaḥ / nātra hetvantaraṃ vācyamityevaśabdārthaḥ / jīvo vāyurityanena
GSP33bbdip13u:256_4: prāṇabhṛcchabdo vyākhyātaḥ / atra vācya ityanuṣajyate / caḥ samuccaye / anena sūtre
GSP33bbdip13u:256_5: caśabdaḥ prāguktahetūnāṃ nānumānamityato nañaśca samākarṣakaḥ / na kevalaṃ rudro 'tra na vācyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:264: ityādiśruterviṣṇuparatvena vāyusādhakatvābhāve 'pi bahudhā janmākhyaliṅgena jīvo 'tra vācyaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha - ajāyamāna iti // dehataḥ 'ajāyamānaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:267_0: tatra tatra prādurbhavatītyarthaḥ / itīti / iti puruṣasūktagatavākyenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:267_1: yasya janmāsambhavo 'bhihitaḥ pūrvavādinā tasyaiva viṣmorna jīvasyetyevaśabdārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:267_2: tathā ca liṅgaṃ sāvakāśamiti na tadvirodha iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:273: na caikyaṃ vācyam / 'juṣṭaṃ yadā paśyatyanyamīśamasya mahimānam'; (muṃ. 3-1-2.)
GSP33bbdip13u:277_2: paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - bhedeti / naikyaṃ vācyamiti / jīveśvarayoratrābhipretamiti ca
GSP33bbdip13u:277_3: śeṣaḥ / anena sūtre nānumānamityato nañanuvartanīyaḥ / sa ca hetugatabhedapratiyoginā
GSP33bbdip13u:277_5: netisamuccayārthaḥ / kau'sau vyapadeśa ityata āha - juṣṭamiti / iti bhedavyapadeśāditi /
GSP33bbdip13u:279: iti darśanakartṛtvena prakṛtajīvasyar iśapadokteścar iśvarādbhedokteḥ na tayoraikyamatrābhipretamiti vācyamiti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / śrutistavānandamayanaye vyākṛtā /
GSP33bbdip13u:290: ato na tayorbheda ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - prakaraṇāditi // itītyanantaram 'ityupakramyādhītam';
GSP33bbdip13u:296: iti paravidyāviṣayavastuno 'trādhītatvena viṣṇuprakaraṇatvātparamātmana eva bhedavyapadeśāvagateḥ na jīvaparamātnorabhedo 'trābhipreta iti vācyamiti sūtrayojanā darśitā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:302: dvāsuparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ bṛkṣaṃ pariṣasvajāte /
GSP33bbdip13u:307: na kevalaṃ 'juṣṭam'; iti bhedaśruterna jīveśabhedo 'tra prakaraṇe vivakṣita iti jñāyate,
GSP33bbdip13u:308: kintu liṅgādapītyāha sūtrakṛt - sthitīti // tadasiddhivāraṇāya śrutyudāharaṇena vyācaṣṭe - dvā suparṇeti / anena - 'dvā suparṇā';
GSP33bbdip13u:309_1: jīveśayoraikyaṃ vācyamiti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / caśabdastu hetusamuccāyaka iti
GSP33bbdip13u:309_3: sūtre tadanusāreṇa bhāṣye ca śrautakramamullaṅghya sthiteḥ prathamamuktiḥ / 'sayujā';

GSP33bbdip13u:610_2: iti garbhāstadāvaraṇabhūtā iti yāvat / reta iti liṅgavyatyayenaikavacanaṃ prathamābahuvacanārthe /

GSP33bbdip13u:671: iti bṛhadbhāṣyoktarītyā prasiddhasthūlādivailakṣaṇyamucyate / sthūlāṇvādipadasya bhāvapradhānatve tu lokikasthaulyādirāhityamanenoktaṃ bhavati / 'alohitaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:679: sarvagatamapi tatkṛtaleparahitam / arasamagandhamityābhyāmupalakṣaṇayā prākṛtarasagandhādirāhityamucyate / acakṣuṣkamityādinā prākṛtasvabhinnacakṣurādirāhityam / 'atejaskaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:683_0: parimitiśūnyam / mīyante ebhiriti mātrā indriyāṇīti ṭīkokteḥ amātraṃ cakṣurādīndriyarahitamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:683_1: vyāsatīrthīyoktiḥ / sarvātmanā śarīrārambhakapañcamātraśūnyaṃ vā / na vidyate 'ntaraṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:686: annādikaṃ śubhamaśubhaṃ vā sāśanānaśanatvena naradevau yathoditau /

GSP33bbdip13u:701_2: ityādinā // na cānena sthūlatvāderanukternacoktaparihāra iti vācyam / 'madhyamo vyāpakaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:704_0: ityukteḥ madhye mīyamānatvānmadhyama iti vyākhyātam / asmin pakṣe niyatamadhyamaparimāṇa-
GSP33bbdip13u:704_1: śūnyatvānnānityatvamiti parihāro 'bhipretaḥ / na vidyate 'nyo vyāpako yasyāsāvavyāpakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:705: sarvadeśakālavyāpī / ādiḥ kāraṇamanādistacchūnya utpattiśūnya iti vā / na vidyate viśvaḥ pūrṇo yasmādaviśvaḥ / pūrṇatvādviśvaḥ / yadvā - 'aviśvo';
GSP33bbdip13u:712: asthūlatvādayaḥ / yata iti niścitā iti śeṣaḥ / asya ataste akṣarasya viṣṇutvaniścāyakā bhavantītyupaskṛtavākyenānvayaḥ / nanu tathāpi te viṣṇoreveti kathaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:713: yasmātte 'prākṛtavigrahe madhyamākṣare 'pi santi / naiṣa doṣaḥ - yataste yatra bhagavadapekṣayaiva santi / anyānapekṣā eva dharmāhyatra hetutvena vivakṣitāḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:722: loke sarvapadārthānāṃ prākṛtaparimāṇasyaiva darśanādityata āha - asthūleti // 'asau puruṣottamaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:725_0: lokabahirbhūto lokāntargataśca bhavati / tathā viruddhadharmarūpaśca bhavati / loke
GSP33bbdip13u:725_1: parasparaṃ viruddhāḥ sthūlatvāṇutvādayo dharmāḥ svarūpabhūtā yasya saḥ tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:725_3: nātropapādakāntaramanveṣaṇīyamutyuktaṃ bhavati / iti brahmāṇḍe ityasya uktatvāt yuktā
GSP33bbdip13u:725_4: ityadhyāhāreṇa te dharmāḥ viṣṇoryuktā eveti pūrvavākyenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:733: ityādisthānaṃ samanvīyate / śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayavākyamudāhṛsya viṣayādikaṃ ca sūcayati - saditi // 'ityādinā';
GSP33bbdip13u:738: ityādikaṃ gṛhyate / taccetyataḥ tadityākṛṣyate / tathā ca ityādinā sataḥ 'tat';
GSP33bbdip13u:741: pratipādyate iti yojanā / anena janmādhikaraṇoktakāraṇatvasya viṣṇvanyasmin pradhāne ākṣepāttenāsya ākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā bhavati / tathā viṣayavākyam,
GSP33bbdip13u:746: tatsṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṃ pralaye sacchabdoktaṃ brahmaivāsīt svātantryeṇeti śeṣaḥ/ tatsat 'ekamevādvitīyaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:749_0: suptau satā sampanno bhavati supta iti siddhānte śrutyarthaḥ / brahmalakṣaṇābhidhāyakānekavākyasaṅgrahakādiśabdaprayogena
GSP33bbdip13u:749_2: śaṅkā nirastā bhavati / atra prakaraṇe śrutānāṃ brahmalakṣaṇānāṃ pradhāne 'sambhavena
GSP33bbdip13u:752: tacca sat 'bahu syāṃ prajāyeya'; (chāṃ. 6-2-3.) iti pariṇāmapratīterna viṣṇuḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:754: sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - tacceti // ca śabdaḥ pradhānamiti padākarṣako 'vadhāraṇe ca / tadityāvṛttaṃ vipariṇamyate / tathā ca 'tat';
GSP33bbdip13u:765: sa hi 'avikārassadā śuddho nitya ātmā sadā hariḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:768: vikāritvapratītāvapi kuto 'yaṃ na viṣṇurityata āha - sa hīti // 'hi';
GSP33bbdip13u:772: tattvena niścitastasmāt tadasambhavāt pradhāne ca tatsambhavāt atra ca vikārapratīteḥ tatsat na viṣṇuḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:773: kintu pradhānameveti yojanā / śrutau dvitīyasya sadāśabdasya sadāvikāra ityanvayaḥ / ādyasya tu sadā 'śuddho'; nirmala iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:782_0: siddhāntayatsūtramavatārya vyācaṣṭe - ata iti // sūtroktaṃ vyapadeśaṃ darśayati -
GSP33bbdip13u:782_1: taditir / ikṣatīti dhātunirdeśena tadarthekṣaṇakriyā lakṣyater / ikṣatikarmeti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:783_0: iti śrutāvīkṣaṇākhyavyāpāre kartṛtvokterityarthaḥ / yadvā karmaśabdena sṛṣṭyādikriyocyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:784_0: ityādisamākhyāmapi pramāṇīkartuṃ sa ityuktam / tadanūdya viṣṇuriti vyākhyātam / viṣṇurevetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:785: ityādisthāna ityarthaḥ / sacchabdeneti pradhānamiti sādhyavākyārthaḥ / anena atra sadevetyādisthāne sacchabdenocyamānaḥ sa viṣṇureva,
GSP33bbdip13u:789: itīkṣaṇākhyakriyākartṛtvaśravaṇādīkṣitṛtvasṛṣṭyādikriyayorvā śravaṇājjaḍaprakṛtau ca tadasambhavāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / sūtre sacchabdeneti śeṣaṃ vinā sa ityasyāvṛttiḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:792: ityādiprakaraṇapratipādyaḥ sa viṣṇureva bhavet, na pradhānamitayartho 'vaseyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:798: nanvīkṣaṇakartṛtvaṃ viṣṇuvatpradhānasya kiṃ na syādityataścetanasyāpi iha hetutvenābhimataṃ mukhyekṣaṇaṃ na sambhavati,
GSP33bbdip13u:801: svātantryeṇa draṣṭā draṣṭṛ ca nāstīti vājasaneyaprakaraṇadvayagatavākyadvayasyārthaḥ / ādiśabdenaivaṃjātīyakaṃ vākyaṃ gṛhyate / 'tasya';
GSP33bbdip13u:802: viṣṇoreva / hi śabdaḥ prasiddhau / svātantryeṇekṣaṇakartṛtvalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ uktamiti śeṣaḥ / asya tasmānna liṅgasya anyagāmitvaṃ mantavyamityupaskṛtavākyenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:808: nanu viṣṇoravikāritayā siddhatvena tatra bahubhāvākhyavikārānvayāyogānniravakāśavikāritvaliṅgenātrekṣatirgauṇo vyākhyeyaḥ / 'sattvātsañjāyate jñānam';
GSP33bbdip13u:809: iti smaraṇāt jñānopādānatayā siddhe pradhāne tatkartṛtvāsambhavena tatra tasyāmukhyatvādityata āha - bahutvaṃ ceti // castvarthaḥ / 'avikāreṇa';
GSP33bbdip13u:810: vikāritvaṃ vinaiva svarūpabahutvenaivetyarthaḥ/ ityādinoktamityanvayaḥ/ tathā ca bahutvasya sāvakāśatvāt na tadbalenar ikṣatergauṇatvaṃ kalpanīyamiti bhāvaḥ/ yadvā - 'bahutvaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:815: vikāraṃ vinaiva niyāmakasvarūpabahutvenaiva mukhyapratipādyenaiva yuktamityuktam iti yojanā / tathā ca - siddhānte 'bahu syām';
GSP33bbdip13u:823: brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminnantara ākāśaḥ ..... kiṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:825: 'ubhe asmin dyāvāpṛthivī antareva samāhite ubhāvagniśca vāyuśca
GSP33bbdip13u:829_0: atrādhikaraṇe sarvādhāratayānveṣṭavyatayā ca sākṣādvā vyavadhānena vā sāmānyato hṛtpadmasthatvaliṅgasya
GSP33bbdip13u:829_1: brahmaṇi samanvayaḥ kriyate / śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayavākyamudāhṛtya viṣayādikaṃ ca
GSP33bbdip13u:829_2: sūcayan sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - candreti // 'etasya vā akṣarasya'; (bṛ. 5-8-9.)
GSP33bbdip13u:830: ityādineti vartate / ādipadena dyāvāpṛthivyādikaṃ gṛhyate / tataḥ kimityata āha - tacceti // tadityāvartate / caḥ samuccaye 'vadhāraṇe ca / tathā ca 'tatra';
GSP33bbdip13u:831: chandogaśrutau yadakṣaranayodāhṛtavākyoktaṃ candrādityādhāratvaṃ tadeva tathā tatsamānādhikaraṇaṃ hṛtpadmasthatvaṃ ca ākāśasya 'atha';
GSP33bbdip13u:833_2: yadvā - atra bhāṣye 'pi candrādityapade rudrabrahmapare / ata eva tattvapradīpe akṣaranaye
GSP33bbdip13u:834_0: iti vacane somaśabdo rudraparatayā vyākṛtaḥ / tathā ca na ko 'pi virodhaḥ / anenākṣaranayoktacandrādityādyādhāratvasya
GSP33bbdip13u:834_1: sākṣāt hṛtpadmasthākāśaniṣṭhatākṣepāttena asyākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā bhavati / evaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:835: iti bhāṣyeṇa sa candrādityādyādhāraḥ kiṃ daharākāśaḥ syāt?
GSP33bbdip13u:837: iti tattvapradīpena ca virodha iti vācyam / tayorakṣarādhikaraṇākṣepeṇa atra pūrvapakṣa iti darśayituṃ pravṛttatvena viṣayapradarśanāyāpravṛttatvāt / 'ākāśasya';
GSP33bbdip13u:838_0: ityanena prasiddhabhūtākāśasyaiva sarvādhāratayā sākṣāt hṛtpadmasthatvamiti pūrvaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:838_1: pakṣaḥ pradarśitaḥ / tathā praśnaprativacanapūrvakaṃ sākṣādākāśasyaivātra sarvādhāratayā
GSP33bbdip13u:838_2: hṛtpadmasthatvakathanāditi pūrvapakṣayuktiśca pradarśitā bhavati / atra yadyapi 'atha
GSP33bbdip13u:838_3: yadidamasmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ tasmin
GSP33bbdip13u:838_4: yadantastadanveṣṭavyaṃ tadvāva vijijñāsitavyamiti / taṃ cadbrūyuḥ...... kiṃ tadatra
GSP33bbdip13u:838_5: vidyate yadanveṣṭavyaṃ yadvā va vijijñāsitavyamiti / sa brūyādyāvānvāyamākāśastāvāneṣo
GSP33bbdip13u:838_6: 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśaḥ / ubhe asmin dyāvāpṛthivī antareva samāhite / ubhāvagniśca vāyuśca
GSP33bbdip13u:840: na tu vicchidya / tathāpi samānajātīyaśrutyantaropasaṅgrahāyaivamudāhṛtamiti dhyeyam / śrutāvathaśabdaḥ prameyāntarārambhārthaḥ / 'brahmapuram';
GSP33bbdip13u:841: ityetat brahmaṇaḥ puraṃ nivāsasthānamiti brahmaiva pūrṇatvātpuramiti ca dvedhā vyākhyeyam / 'antarhṛdaye';
GSP33bbdip13u:843: iti prathamāntam / tathā ca etasmin brahmapure śarīre yatpuraṃ brahmāsti 'asmin';
GSP33bbdip13u:851: jñātavyaṃ mārgitavyaṃ vā / nanu na ghaṭādivadanveṣaṇaṃ yuktam,
GSP33bbdip13u:852: apratyakṣatvādityatastadeva vivṛṇoti - tadvāveti // vāvetyavadhāraṇe / tathā ca tadeva 'vijijñāsitavyaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:860_0: kiṃmahimaṃ ceti / na ca brahmapure brahmaṇo veśmetyuktyaivākāśasya brahmatvaniścayātpraśnāyoga
GSP33bbdip13u:864: tadākhyaḥ paramātmāstīti / nanvaṇau tasmin kathaṃ dyāvāpṛthivyādyavasthitirityatastasya vyāptatvamāha - yāvāniti // 'ayaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:866: tadākhyo bhagavān guṇataḥ parimāṇataśca yāvān eṣa āntaro 'pi tāvāneva / tathā cāṇāvapi rūper iśaśaktyā mahattvasyāpi sattvādvyāptasya tasyānekādhāratvaṃ yujyata eveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:867: anyaparityāgenāsyaiva jijñāsyatve ko heturityato 'sya sarvādhāratvākhyaṃ mahimānamāha - ubha ityādinā // asminnantare ye ubhe muktāmukte dyāvāpṛthivyau devyau 'samāhite';
GSP33bbdip13u:868_0: samavasthite / evamubhayavidhau agniśca vāyuścetyetau devau samāśritau / tathā ubhau
GSP33bbdip13u:868_1: muktāmuktau sūryācandramasau vidyut nakṣatrāṇi ca samāśritānīti chāndogyabhāṣyarītyā
GSP33bbdip13u:869_0: ityatra hṛtpadmasthākāśagataṃ brahmānveṣṭavyamityuktam / na ca padmasthasya brahmatvāsiddhiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:869_2: tathā ca padme brahmāstītyukte 'pi tadbrahma kiṃ prakāramiti bhāvena punaḥ 'kiṃ tadatra vidyate';
GSP33bbdip13u:871_0: ityādyāha guruḥ / anena ca yadbrahmānveṣṭavyatayoktaṃ tadbrahmāntarhṛdaye yāvāneṣa
GSP33bbdip13u:871_1: prasiddhākāśastāvān sarvo 'pyākāśo vartate / tasmiṃścākāśe pṛthivyādikaṃ sarvaṃ samāśritam /
GSP33bbdip13u:871_3: ukto bhavatīti prakārāntareṇa vyākhyātam / pūrvapakṣī tu - 'hṛdaya ākāśe';
GSP33bbdip13u:872_0: iti padaṃ saptamyantaṃ kṛtvā daharākāśastho vyāptākāśo 'nveṣṭavya iti vā ākāśaḥ iti
GSP33bbdip13u:872_2: taṃ viśiṣya jijñāsyatvena tatra dyāvāpṛthivyādikamucyata ityāha /
GSP33bbdip13u:875: sa cākāśo na viṣṇuḥ / 'tasyānte suṣiraṃ sūkṣmaṃ tasmin
GSP33bbdip13u:879: iti nyāyena viṣṇutvena viṣṇoreva hṛtpadmasthvaṃ sidhyatītyata āha - sa ceti // castvarthaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:880: pratijñāsamuccaye vā / tathā ca yassarvādāratayā hṛtpadmasthatvena ca śrutyuktaḥ 'sa cākāśo na viṣṇuḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:881_0: bhūtameva na tu viṣṇurityarthaḥ / kuto vā na viṣṇurityata āha - tasyānta iti / sa
GSP33bbdip13u:883: suṣiraśabdaśravaṇāt suṣirasya chidrātmakaprasiddhākāśasyaiva śruteḥ sarvādhāratayā hṛtpadmasthatvokteḥ tatsamākhyānādityarthaḥ / 'tasya';
GSP33bbdip13u:895: sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ'; (chāṃ 8-7-3.) ityādibhya uttarebhyo guṇebhyo dahare viṣṇureva /
GSP33bbdip13u:900: iti śeṣaḥ / ityādyuttaravākyebhya iti paryavasitārthaḥ / yadvā 'guṇebhyo';
GSP33bbdip13u:901: guṇavacanebhya ityarthaḥ / hetvasiddhiparihārāya śrutyudāharaṇam / ādipadena 'viśoko 'vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṅkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:905: na paramata iva prathamāntamityuktaṃ bhavati / sthito 'nveṣṭavyatayokta iti śeṣaḥ / samanvayasūtrādanuvṛttasya vidheyaparasya tattvityasyārtho viṣṇoreveti / anena - 'yaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:908: viṣṇureva na bhūtākāśādiriti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / yo hṛtpadmākāśagataḥ paramātmā 'na vadhenāsya hanyate'; (chāṃ. 8-1-5.)
GSP33bbdip13u:910: nityameva svato 'pahatapāpmā pāpātyantābhāvavāniti yāvat / ata eva na tatkāryaṃ jarādikamasyetyucyate - vijara ityādinā / 'avijighatsaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:914: pramāṇabādhitatvāt / kintu tatpīḍābhāvaḥ / atra hetuḥ - satyakāma iti / tasya yadiṣṭaṃ tatsvataḥ eva bhavediti satyakāmaḥ / tatrāpi hetuḥ - 'satyasaṅkalpaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:915: apratihatasaṅkalpa iti/ ya evaṃ bhūtaḥ so 'nveṣṭavya iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:919: 'sa eṣa sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhya uditaḥ'; (chāṃ. 1-6-7.) ityādinā viṣṇoreva hi te guṇāḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:934_0: vākyena ādiśabdena satyakāmatvādiguṇāntarabodhakavākyāni gṛhyante / hi śabdo yata
GSP33bbdip13u:934_1: ityarthe / te apahatapāpmatvādirūpottaravākyoktāḥ siddhā iti śeṣaḥ / tasmānna teṣāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:934_2: viṣṇuliṅgatvaniścayaḥ iti vākyaśeṣeṇāsyānvayaḥ / anyatra pāpādyabhāvasya kathañcidyoge
GSP33bbdip13u:934_3: 'pi sarvathā satyakāmatvādikaṃ na yujyata iti jñāpanāyādiśabdabahuvacanayoḥ prayogaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:942: anyānapekṣayā nityaṃ tīrṇā aśanāyādayo yena sa harireka eva,
GSP33bbdip13u:946: na svata ityarthaḥ / hi śabdaḥ prasiddhau / 'pādme';
GSP33bbdip13u:947: uktamiti śeṣaḥ / ato nirapekṣaguṇānāmanyatrābhāvāt viṣṇorevetyuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:952: nanu ramādiṣvapahatapāpmatvādīnāmanyānadhīnānāmabhāve 'pi yathā kathañcitsattvādanyagataistaiḥ kathaṃ viṣṇutvaniścaya ityata āha - sāpekṣeti // 'sāpekṣam';
GSP33bbdip13u:956: liṅgatveneti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca vivakṣitaliṅgasyānyatrābhāvāttena viṣṇutvaniścayo bhavatyeveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:962_1: sākṣādvābhimānidvārā vā yathākathañcidvṛttāvapi na kathañcidanyatra satyakāmatvādyastīti
GSP33bbdip13u:965_0: viṣṇoranyaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṅkalpaśca nāsti / viṣṇau tadbhāvasya tadanyasmin tadabhāvasya
GSP33bbdip13u:965_1: ca pratipādanāya vakroktiḥ / viṣṇoranyeṣāṃ ramādīnāṃ kvacidāgame pratīyamānamapi
GSP33bbdip13u:966: viṣṇukāmanāviṣayaviṣayakakāmanāvattvarūpameva bhavenna mukhyamityarthaḥ / tathā cāpahatapāpmatvaṃ svataḥ parādhīnaṃ ceti yathā dvividhaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:970: uktamiti śeṣaḥ/ ataḥ satyakāmatvādivivakṣayā viṣṇoreva hi te guṇā ityuktaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:974: gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca | BBs_1,3.15 |
GSP33bbdip13u:983: brahmalokaṃ brahmaṇo viṣṇorāvāsasthānabhūtaṃ hṛtpadmaṃ taddvārā tatratyaṃ brahma sākṣāllokapadoktaṃ brahmākhyamāśrayaṃ vā 'na vindanti'; na vijānanti,
GSP33bbdip13u:984: sa eṣa ātmā hṛdīti śrutyarathaḥ / itīti / iti chandogavākye 'suptasya';
GSP33bbdip13u:986: aharaho hṛdgataṃ brahmalokaṃ prati gatiḥ prāptiḥ 'ucyate';
GSP33bbdip13u:988: ityatrāpi taditi padaṃ buddhyā vivicya vipariṇāmena sambadhyate / tathā ca tasmin prāpyamāṇe hṛdgate brahmaloke 'brahmaśabdaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:990: śrūyate ityarthaḥ / ucyate ca ityapi sambandhaḥ / caḥ samuccaye / yata iti śeṣaḥ / asyāto 'pi dahare viṣṇureveti pradhānasādhyenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:996: suptaprāpyatvaṃ kuto viṣṇutvaniścāyakamityata āha - sateti // he 'somya';
GSP33bbdip13u:1002: prāpnoti / iti jñāyate iti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca suptaprāpyatvasya viṣṇuliṅgatvena śrutiprasiddhatvāt tena viṣṇutvaniścayo bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1005: 'araśca ha vai ṇyaścārṇavau brahmaloke'; (chāṃ 8-5-3.) iti liṅgaṃ ca tathā dṛṣṭam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1008: iti sūtraśeṣaṃ hetvantaraparatayā vyācaṣṭe - araśceti // ca śabdo hetusamuccaye / yathā suptagamyatvam 'aharahaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1011_0: iti śrutau hṛtpadmasthe dṛṣṭaṃ śrutamiti / upamāyāṃ tathāśabdaḥ / anenāsiddhiḥ parihṛtā /
GSP33bbdip13u:1011_1: na ca gatiśabdayorivāsya sannidhau hṛtpadmasthasyānukterasiddhyanivṛttiriti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1011_2: hṛtpadmasthasya brahmaṇa āvāsatvena nimittena tallokabhūte hṛtpadme 'etaṃ brahmalokam';
GSP33bbdip13u:1012_1: hṛtpadmasthabrahmaniṣṭhatāyā prāptatvāt / dṛṣṭamityanantaraṃ yata iti śeṣaḥ / asyāto
GSP33bbdip13u:1012_2: 'pi dahare viṣṇureveti pratijñāvākyenānvayaḥ / śrutau havā iti nipātau prasiddhidyotakau /
GSP33bbdip13u:1012_3: samudrayoranyonyasamuccaye ca śabdau / tathā ca brahmaṇo viṣṇorloke śvetadvīpe araṇyākhyārṇavau
GSP33bbdip13u:1012_4: sudhāsamudrau arṇavopame sudhāsarasī vā sta iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1015: araśca vaiṇyaśca sudhāsamudrau tatraiva sarvābhimatapradau dvau /
GSP33bbdip13u:1020: sarveṣṭakarau sta ityarthaḥ / evakāro 'nyatra sattvavyāvartakaḥ / tenāraṇyāśrayalokavattvaliṅgasya viṣṇutvenāvyabhicāraḥ siddhyati / ata eva bhāṣye tasyaivetyevakāraḥ / 'ityādinā';
GSP33bbdip13u:1026: yasmādityarthe / tasmādetalliṅgabalāt viṣṇutvaniśrayo yukta iti vākyaśeṣaḥ / yadvā - brahmalokamiti hṛtpadmasya viṣṇulokatvokteḥ tadantargato viṣṇurityuktaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1027: brahmalokapadaṃ kuto viṣṇulokavācītyata āha - araśceti / brahmalokapadasya viṣṇuloke 'araśca';
GSP33bbdip13u:1028: iti vākye prayogādatra hṛtpadme prayuktam 'etaṃ brahmalokam';
GSP33bbdip13u:1030_0: iti śrutāvapi brahmalokapadaṃ kuto viṣṇulokaparamiti vācyam / yatastatrāraṇyāśrayatvaliṅgaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1030_1: śrutamityarthaḥ / athāpyaraṇyāśrayatvasya bhagavallokaliṅgatvaṃ kuta ityata āha -
GSP33bbdip13u:1030_2: araśceti // asmin pakṣe sautraṃ liṅgapadaṃ hṛtpadmasthasya brahmatvarūpapradānasādhye
GSP33bbdip13u:1030_5: liṅgaṃ ceti pṛthaguktiryuktā / anena - na kevalamuttarebhyo guṇebhyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1032: iti vākye hṛtpadmasthaniṣṭhatayā śrutābhyāṃ suptaprāpyabrahmaśabdābhyāṃ ca dahare viṣṇureveti jñāyate / na kevalametābhyāmeva,
GSP33bbdip13u:1036: viṣṇuliṅgatvena smṛtisiddhamaraṇyāśrayalokavattvarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ hṛtpadmasthe viṣṇuloke prayuktabrahmalokapadasya hṛtpadme prayogāt 'dṛṣṭaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1037: śrutamato 'pi dahare viṣṇureva / yadvā - kuto 'tra prayuktasya brahmalokapadasya viṣṇulokaparatvam?
GSP33bbdip13u:1039: iti vākye viṣṇuloke brahmalokapadaprayogāt / atrāpi 'etaṃ brahmalokam';
GSP33bbdip13u:1040: iti tasyaiva prayogāt / na ca tatrāpi viṣṇulokaparatvaṃ kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:1041: yato 'raṇyāśrayatvaṃ liṅgaṃ 'dṛṣṭaṃ'; śrutamata iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1049: hetvantareṇa viṣṇorhṛtpadmasthatvaṃ pratipādayatsūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - dhṛteriti // 'iti dhṛteḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1051_1: asya dahare viṣṇureveti pratijñāvākyenānvayaḥ / śrutau vidhṛtiḥ seturityanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1051_2: tatra vidhṛtirityetatsetutve hetuḥ / tathā ca ya ātmā hṛtpadmasthatvenoktaḥ sa eṣa 'eṣāṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1056: āśraya ityarthaḥ / dhārakatvaṃ ca na dhāryādbahiṣṭhatayā,
GSP33bbdip13u:1059: ityukteḥ mukhyārtha eva vā setuśabdaḥ / yadyapi 'sa seturvidhṛtiḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1060: iti chandogaśrutipāṭhaḥ / tathāpi śākhāntarāṇāmapyatropasaṅgrahāyaivamuktiḥ / evamanyatrāpīti sampradāyavidaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1065_1: vyākhyāyedānīṃ samagraṃ sūtraṃ samānoktirūpasamākhyāparatayā vyācaṣṭe - eṣa iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1065_2: dhṛteritipadamatrānuṣajyate / asmin pakṣe sautracaśbada upalabdheścetyanveti / tathā
GSP33bbdip13u:1067: dhṛtiyuktāyāstadbodhikāyā upalabdheḥ vāsaneyake 'ya eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśastasmin śete sarvasya vaśī'; (bṛ. 6-4-21.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1068: ityādyuktvā āmnātāyāḥ 'eṣa sarveśvara eṣa bhūtādhipatireṣa bhūtapāla eṣa seturvidharaṇa eṣāṃ lokānāmasambhedāya';
GSP33bbdip13u:1069_0: ityukteḥ samānokteśca dahare viṣṇureveti yojanā / samākhyāyāḥ kuto viṣṇuparatvamityata
GSP33bbdip13u:1069_1: āha - eṣa iti / ityādīti luptatṛtīyāvibhaktiko nirdeśaḥ / ādiśabdena 'eṣa sarvasya
GSP33bbdip13u:1071: ityuttaravākyaṃ ca gṛhyate / ata eva madhyasthavākyagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam / asya mahimna iti vyadhikaraṇaṣaṣṭhyau / upalabdherityāvṛttamatrānveti / tathā ca 'asmin';
GSP33bbdip13u:1083: tametaṃ bhagavantaṃ brāhmaṇā vividiṣantīti śrutyarthaḥ / anena - na kevalaṃ pūrvoktahetubhyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1085: iti sarvādhāratvaliṅgaśravaṇādapi daharapadmastho viṣṇureva / na cāsya hṛtpadmasthatvaṃ kuta iti vācyam / 'asya';
GSP33bbdip13u:1090: kintu dhṛterdhṛtiyuktāyā upalabdherukteḥ / 'ya eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśastasmin śete .... eṣa seturvidharaṇaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1091: iti vājasaneyasamākhyāyāśca dahare viṣṇureva / samākhyāyā api kuto viṣṇuviṣayatvam?
GSP33bbdip13u:1095: bhūtādhipatitvāderuktatvāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / yadyapi 'asya mahimnaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1096: ityādyaṃśo bhāṣye dhṛteścetyasya liṅgaparatayā yojanāyāṃ nānvitaḥ / tathāpi ṭīkāyāṃ 'sarve pāpmāno 'taḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1105: tatsamānādhikaraṇatvenāsiddhatvādityata āha - etasminniti // 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane';
GSP33bbdip13u:1106: iti pratīkagrahaṇena 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1107: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi dyāvāpṛthivyau';
GSP33bbdip13u:1111: 'sa hi sarvādhipatiḥ sa hi sarvapālaḥ sar iśaḥ sa
GSP33bbdip13u:1114: nanu samākhyāśrutyuktaḥ sarveśvaratvādimahimā kuto viṣṇoravagata ityata āha - sa hīti // 'sa hi';
GSP33bbdip13u:1121: cetaneśvaraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tadviśvamupajīvatītyarthaḥ/ ityādīti / evamādiśrutivākyebhya ityarthaḥ / ādiśabdenaitajjātīyaṃ gṛhyate / tṛtīyārthe pañcamī/ 'tasya';
GSP33bbdip13u:1124: ityādimahimā / avagata iti śeṣaḥ / tasmānnaiteṣāṃ viṣṇutvarūpasādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyāsiddhiriti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1130_0: nanu sarveśvaratvādikaṃ viṣṇuvadanyasyāpi kiṃ na syādityata āha - sarveśa iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1130_1: atra sarvajagacchabdau cetanācetanaprapañcaparau / yadvā - jagataḥ patiriti pratiyogitvenaivoktasyānuvādaḥ / athavā - 'patiḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1131_0: pālakaḥ / tathā ca sarveśvaraḥ sarvapālakaśca viṣṇureka eva nānyo 'stītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1131_1: iti skānda ityasya evakāroktapadādhyāhāreṇa tasyahyeṣa mahimeti pūrveṇānvayaḥ / tasmānnaitalliṅgānāmanyatra
GSP33bbdip13u:1137: 'tatrāpi daharaṃ gaganaṃ viśokastasmin yadantastadupāsitavyam'; (mahānā. 10-7.) iti prasiddheśca //
GSP33bbdip13u:1139: samākhyāntararūpayuktyantareṇa viṣṇorhṛtpadmagatākāśasthatvaṃ sādhayatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - prasiddheśceti // itītyanantaraṃ śrutāviti śeṣaḥ / tasyetyanuvartate / 'tasya';
GSP33bbdip13u:1141: hṛtpadmasthasyeti tadarthaḥ / anena - sūtre 'syāsminnitipadadvayaṃ pūrvasūtrādanuvartanīyam / tathā ca na kevalaṃ vājasaneyasamākhyānāt,
GSP33bbdip13u:1144: hṛtpadmasthasya viṣṇutvaprasiddheśca tatsamākhyānādapi daharapadmastho viṣṇureveti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / 'divye brahmapure hyeṣa vyomnyātmā sampratiṣṭhitaḥ'; (muṃ. 2-2-7.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1146: iti taittirīyavākyāntare prasiddheśceti sūtrasya yadvṛttyantaraṃ ṭīkāyāṃ sūcitaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1147: tadbhāṣyasthetiśabdasyādyarthatvamāśrityeti draṣṭavyam / śrutau 'daharaṃ vipāpmaṃ paraveśmabhūtaṃ yatpuṇḍarīkaṃ puramadhyasaṃstham'; (mahānā. 10-7.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1148: iti vākye yat 'daharam'; alpaṃ parasya brahmaṇaḥ sadmabhūtam,
GSP33bbdip13u:1149: ata eva vigatapāpaṃ dehākhyabrahmapuramadhye saṃsthaṃ hṛdayakamalaṃ prakṛtaṃ tattatreti parāmṛśyate / tathā ca 'tatrāpi';
GSP33bbdip13u:1153_0: viśokaṃ viśokapadopalakṣitaṃ jarādiśūnyaṃ yadbrahma tadupāsitavyamityarthaḥ / viśokaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:1153_1: iti liṅgavyatyayaḥ chāndasaḥ / tattvapradīpe tu - liṅgavyatyāsastasya puruṣatvajñāpanārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1159: nanu sākṣāt padmagatasya viṣṇutvābhyupagame suṣiraśrutivirodhaḥ / evaṃ padmagatākāśasyaiva viṣṇutvābhyupagame 'pi suṣiraśrutivirodhaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1162_1: sarvādhāratvokterityata āha - tadantasstheti // buddhyā viviktasuṣiraśrutipadaṃ ṣaṣṭhyantamatrānvīyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1165: evamihāpīti bhāvaḥ / tadantassthatveti pāṭhe paramātmanaḥ suṣirāntassthatvamapekṣya śruteḥ pravṛttatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1176_0: ityanantaramityuktasyeti śeṣaḥ / asya ca samāsapraviṣṭajīvapadenānvayaḥ / anena sūtre
GSP33bbdip13u:1176_2: ata eva śrutāveṣa iti jīvaparāmarśaḥ / siddhānte śrutyarthastu vakṣyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1182: ityasyānuvṛttimabhipretyaparihārāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - neti // hṛtpadmastho na jīva ityarthaḥ / kuto netyatastatrānuvṛttavākyena 'asmin';
GSP33bbdip13u:1184_1: vyācaṣṭe - tasyeti // jīvasyetyarthaḥ / muktabhāvamādāya jīve sambhavāt asiddhivārāṇāya
GSP33bbdip13u:1189: upasthāpanāt / jīvaparāmarśakaitacchabdaśravaṇāditi yāvat / dahare sa jīva eva,
GSP33bbdip13u:1190: na viṣṇuriti cet - na hṛtpadmastho jīvaḥ/ kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:1191: asminprakaraṇe 'syāpahatapāpmatvāderupalabdheḥ śravaṇāt / asya cāsmin jīve svato 'sambhavāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1201: evaṃrūpāddaharavākyāpekṣayā parāmarśavākyāpekṣayā vānantarādvacanādityarthaḥ / vacanādityanantaram asyāsminnupalabdherityanuṣajyate / sambhavāditi śeṣaḥ / 'asya';
GSP33bbdip13u:1204: siddheruktaguṇānāṃ sambhavāditi tadarthaḥ / jīva ityanena pūrvasūtrātsa ityasyānuvṛttiḥ sūcitā/ neśvarā iti evaśabdārthaḥ / hṛtpadmastha iti vartate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1207: na, tatra hi parameśvaraprasādādāvirbhūtasvarūpo mukta ucyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1209_0: nañanuvṛttyā parihārāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - neti // naitadvākyabalena jīvasya satyakāmatvādiguṇān
GSP33bbdip13u:1210: ityaṃśaṃ tatreti padādhyāhāreṇa vyācaṣṭe - tatreti // 'sa tatra';
GSP33bbdip13u:1212: ucyate iti sambandhaḥ / āvirbhūtasvarūpaḥ ityasya vyākhyānaṃ mukta iti / hiśabdo yata ityarthe / uttaravacanādityatrāpi sambadhyate / tathā ca 'uttaravacanāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:1214_1: ca dehāntaravṛttitayā muktatvāyogāt nāyaṃ jīva iti bhāvaḥ / nanvasya muktaviṣayatve
GSP33bbdip13u:1214_2: 'pi muktasyāpi jīvatve nāstyeva jīve 'pahatapāpmatvādisambhavaḥ / na ca tasya hṛtpadmasthatvāyogaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1215_0: yato jīvo bhāvibhāvenāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇaḥ idānīṃ hṛtpadmagatatayocyata ityata āha
GSP33bbdip13u:1215_1: - parameśvaraprasādāditi / evetyanuvartate / anena tu śabdo vyākhyātaḥ / parameśvaraprasādādityanena
GSP33bbdip13u:1215_2: uttarādityetaduttamādityapi vyākhyātam / atra mukta iti na sautrapadavyākhyānamātram /
GSP33bbdip13u:1215_3: kintūddeśyasamarpakaṃ ca / anena āvṛttistuśabdasya yathāśrutānvayaśca sūcitaḥ / tathā
GSP33bbdip13u:1215_4: ca yo 'tra mukta ucyate sa tu parameśvaraprasādādeva 'āvirbhūtasvarūpaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1216: āvirbhūto vyaktaḥ svarūpaḥ apahatapāpmatvādiḥ svadharmo yasya sa tathoktaḥ / ato na svato 'pahatapāpmatvādiguṇakaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1217: ato na daharasthaḥ jīva iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:1220: yatprasādātsa mukto bhavati sa bhagavān pūrvoktaḥ// 19 //
GSP33bbdip13u:1224: na tu tadguṇānāṃ parameśvarādhīnatvam / atastatsvata evetyata āha - yaditi // asya yacchabdasya dvitīyatacchabdenānvayaḥ / prasādo nāma icchāviśeṣaḥ / 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1225_0: jīvaḥ / punaḥ sa ityuktyā sūtre 'nuvṛttasya sa ityasyāvṛttiḥ sūcitā / pūrvokta ityanena
GSP33bbdip13u:1225_1: sūtre uttaratretyasya pratiyogitayā pūrvatretyupaskāryamityuktaṃ bhavati / tatheti
GSP33bbdip13u:1233_0: guṇapradātṛtayā ukta iti yojanā / anyathā lyabantapadaṃ vyarthaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1233_1: ukta ityanantaraṃ yata iti śeṣaḥ / asyātonātra muktaguṇaprāpteḥ parameśvarādhīnatvoktyabhāva
GSP33bbdip13u:1233_2: ityupaskṛtavākyenānvayaḥ / athavā - nanu jīve 'nyādhīnasya tadguṇajātasya sattvātsa
GSP33bbdip13u:1233_3: evāpahatapāpmatvādinokto hṛtpadmasthaścāstvityata āha - yaditi / yojanā tu - yatprasādātsa
GSP33bbdip13u:1236: ityādipūrvavākye tathāpahatapāpmatvādinokto na jīvaḥ / dātṛpratigṛhītrormadhye dātureva mukhyatvānmukhyāmukhyayośca mukhyasyaiva grāhyatvāditi //
GSP33bbdip13u:1243: tata evāsya viśokatvādeḥ siddheśca / ata evāsyoktaguṇāsambhavābhāvātsa hṛtpadmastho jīva eva neśvara iti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip13u:1245_0: ityuttaravākyabalādāvirbhūtasvarūpo mukta ucyate / sa ca dehānantargatatayā na hṛtpadmastho
GSP33bbdip13u:1245_1: bhavatīti bhāvaḥ / na ca muktasyāpi jīvatvena tatrāpahatapāpmatvahṛtpadmasthatvayorbhinnakālīnatve
GSP33bbdip13u:1245_2: 'pi sāmānādhikaraṇyopapatterasti punastasya prāptiriti vācyam / yato 'tra vākye yo
GSP33bbdip13u:1245_3: mukta ucyate sa uttarāduttamātparameśvaraprasādādevāvirbhūtasvarūpo na svataḥ / na
GSP33bbdip13u:1246: na parameśvarādhīnatvaṃ tadguṇajātasyeti vācyam / yataḥ pūrvatra 'paraṃ jyotiḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1247_0: iti pūrvavākye yatprasādātsa mukto bhavati sa paramātmā tathā guṇapradātṛtayocyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1248: abhivyaktāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇakaḥ sa tu bhagavāneva pūrvatra 'eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā'; (chāṃ. 8-1-5.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1250: na muktajīva iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / śrutyarthastu 'eṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1259: paraṃ jyotirakhyaḥ / muktasya viṣayaiścaraṇaprakāramāha - sa iti / 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1262: svāpekṣitaṃ bhakṣayan hasanvā jñātibhissaha muktaiḥ ajñātibhiḥ pūrvakalpamuktaiḥ 'krīḍan';
GSP33bbdip13u:1271: yaṃ prāpya svena rūpeṇa jīvo 'bhiniṣpadyate sa eṣa ātmeti
GSP33bbdip13u:1276_1: hṛtpadmasthātmā kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya 'itaraparāmarśātsa iti cenna';
GSP33bbdip13u:1277: ityanuvṛttapūrvavākyenāpekṣitasya siddhāntapratijñāyāśca lābhānnetyuktasādhye hetutayā sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - anyeti // śrutau 'paraṃjyotiḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1278_0: iti napuṃsakapadanirdiṣṭasya yamiti pulliṅgena nirdeśo liṅgasyāvivakṣitatvādvā viśeṣyaśabdavivakṣayā
GSP33bbdip13u:1278_1: vā yuktaḥ / anena śrutau paraṃjyotiriti ekaṃ padam / yadvakṣyati 'paraṃjyotiḥśabdena
GSP33bbdip13u:1280_0: iti paurāṇikarūḍhyā viṣṇuvācītyuktaṃ bhavati / jyotiḥ prakāśarūpaṃ paraṃ brahmeti
GSP33bbdip13u:1280_1: bhinne pade ityapi kecit / asmin pakṣe uktabhāṣyavirodhaḥ / kiṃ ca yaṃ 'paraṃjyotirākhyaṃ bhagavantam';
GSP33bbdip13u:1283: etacchabdaḥ / yadvā - paramātmana evātmatvavidhānamarthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasya sa,
GSP33bbdip13u:1285: etacchabdena parigrahaṇamityarthaḥ / sūtrabhāṣyayoścaśabdastu na kevalaṃ jīvapakṣe 'pahatapāpmatvāsambhavākhyabādhakasadbhāvaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1286: kintu parāmarśākhyasādhakābhāvaśceti samuccayārthastuśabdārtho vā / candrikāyāṃ tu - na kevalaṃ parāmarśasyar iśvarapakṣe bādhakatvābhāvaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1287: kintu jīvapakṣasādhakatvābhāvaścetyuktatvātparāmarśo jīvānyeśvarārtha eva ityavadhāraṇārthatayā vyākhyātaḥ / anena - 'itaraparāmarśāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:1289: iti parāmṛśya tasya hṛtpadmasthatvavidhānātsa hṛtpadmastha ātmā jīva eva neśvara iti cet - na, kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:1293: kintu yataḥ parāmarśo 'nyārtho 'pi / yadvā - asambhavānna hṛtpadmastho jīvaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1294: kintvīśvara eva / na caivaṃ parāmarśāyogaḥ / yataḥ 'parāmarśaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1295: etacchabdastu anyārtha iti tredhāsūtrārtha ukto bhavati / 'yaṃ prāpya';
GSP33bbdip13u:1296_0: yatsamīpaṃ prāpyeti / anena jīvaḥ paraṃ jyotirākhyaṃ paramātmānamupasampadyāparokṣato
GSP33bbdip13u:1296_1: jñātvā atha samīpaṃ prāpyavidyāvidhūnanenānandādinā svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate āvirbhūtasvaguṇo
GSP33bbdip13u:1296_2: bhavatīti yāvat / yaṃ prāpya svarūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate jīvaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1297: sa eṣa ātmā ya ātmeti prāguktaḥ paramātmeti hovāca brahmādīn prati rameti siddhānte śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1307: iti vākyaṃ gṛhyate / alpapadaṃ cālpasthānasthitiparam / śruterityanantaramasambhavādityanuvartate / asminniti cāsti / tathā ca 'daharaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1316_0: sūtre 'nuvṛttanaña āvṛttimabhipretya parihārāṃśaṃ vyākhyāti - neti // nālpasthānasthitiśravaṇaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1316_1: viṣṇāvanupapannamityarthaḥ / kuto netyataḥ pravṛttaṃ taduktamityaṃśaṃ yata ityadhyāhārābhiprāyeṇa
GSP33bbdip13u:1316_2: hetutayā vyākhyāti - nicāyyatvāditi / atrāpīti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca 'nicāyyatvāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:1324_0: aṃśasyāpūrṇatvāt / brahmaṇi tu aṃśo 'pi pūrṇa iti kathaṃ tasyāṃśato 'lpaukastvamityataḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:1324_1: sūtraśeṣaṃ prakarāntareṇa vyācaṣṭe - eṣa ma iti // ca śabdo yuktisamuccaye / sūtrakṛcchrutyuktisamuccaye
GSP33bbdip13u:1330: kintu sa jīva eveti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip13u:1332: tatra nicāyyatvāditi pūrvatra tasya sarvagatasyāpi viṣṇorvyomavattadalpasthānasthitatvam,
GSP33bbdip13u:1333: tasmādupāsanārthaṃ yuktamityuktam / na cāṃśatopi sarvagatatayā tatra tadanupapattiḥ / yatastasyāṃ 'eṣa ma ātmā'; (chāṃ. 3-14-3.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1334_0: iti chandogaśrutau tena sarvajyāyastvena vṛddhatamatvena vyāptatvenaiva prakāreṇa
GSP33bbdip13u:1334_1: tasya viṣṇostaddhṛdayasthatvamuktaṃ smṛtyuktaṃ cāta iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1338: paramātmāsti / upalakṣaṇametat / sarvahṛdaye ca ya āste eṣaḥ hṛdayasthāṃśarūpo bhagavān 'jyāyān';
GSP33bbdip13u:1339: vṛddhatamaḥ deśakālaguṇaiḥ pūrṇa iti śrutyarthaḥ / upaniṣaddraṣṭṛṛṣivākyametat / ('viruddhagatayo 'pi';
GSP33bbdip13u:1341: vartante ca / na kālabhedenetyāha - aniśamiti / muktasādhāraṇyamāśaṅkyāha -vidyādaya iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:1342_1: yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ / jñānajñeyā iti yāvat / harau viruddhadharmasattve pramāṇamāha
GSP33bbdip13u:1350: śāśvataṃ netareṣām / tadetaditi manyante 'nirdeśyaṃ paramaṃ sukham'; (kaṭha. 5-12,14.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1354: iti vākyoktaṃ jñānārthaṃ jñeyaprārthanāviṣayatvaṃ vā 'kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyāṃ kimu bhāti';
GSP33bbdip13u:1355_1: liṅgaṃ brahmaṇi samanvīyate / śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayādikaṃ ca sūcayan sayuktikaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1356: ānandamayādhikaraṇe udāhṛtādṛśya iti vākye iti bhāvaḥ / uktā ityanantaraṃ tatra praviṣṭamiti śeṣaḥ / prathamādipadenāniruktatvādeḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1357: dvitīyena 'kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyāṃ kimu bhāti na bhāti vā'; (kaṭha. 5-14)
GSP33bbdip13u:1358: iti samanvetavyaliṅgabodhakottarārdhasya ca grahaṇam / na kevalaṃ viṣṇoḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1364_0: iti pūrvavākyaikadeśopanyāsaḥ / ata eva tattvapradīpe teṣāmiti prastutiḥ pūrvapakṣotthāpiketyuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1364_1: tathācetthaṃ yojanā - pūrvamānandamayādhikaraṇe ye 'dṛśyatvādayo guṇāḥ parameśvarasyoktāḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1367: jñānisukhasyaivocyata iti / pūrvārdhenānirdeśyatvasyottarārdhe ca 'kimu bhāti na bhāti';
GSP33bbdip13u:1368_1: pāṭhābhyupagamādvā na tadvirodhaḥ / atrānirdeśyatvamajñeyatvaṃ cocyata iti phaloktiḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1369_0: ānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇatvasyaivātra vicāryatvāt / tattu dvitīyādiśabdopāttavākyena caśabdena
GSP33bbdip13u:1369_1: vā sūcitamiti draṣṭavyam / yata evamataḥ pūrvoktamayuktamiti bhāvaḥ / anenānandamayādhikaraṇoktādṛśyatvājñeyatvarūpasyānirdeśyatvāniruktatvarūpasya
GSP33bbdip13u:1369_3: saṅgatiruktā bhavati / tathā caśabdasūcitamānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇatvaṃ viṣayaḥ / viṣṇoranyasya
GSP33bbdip13u:1369_4: veti sandehaḥ / jñānisukhasyaiveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ / anirdeśyatvājñeyatve ca tasyaiveti phalaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1378: 'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvam'; ityanukṛteḥ, 'tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'; (kaṭha. 5-15.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1383_0: ityanubhānaśruterityarthaḥ / anubhānaṃ nāma tadicchānurodhena bhānaṃ kriyāviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1383_2: gṛhyamāṇasya tatkartuḥ sūryāditejasaśca lābho bhavatīti spaṣṭatvāttadubhayānuktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1383_4: tadubhayānuktiḥ / na kevalaṃ tasyetyetat samanvetavyānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇatvākhyaliṅgadharmiṇaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1385: kintu śrutipratīkarūpamapi sarvajagatprakāśakatvaparaṃ cetyāśayena taddhetvantaraparatayā vyācaṣṭe - tasyeti / 'iti vacanāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:1386: ityanena sūtre ityukteriti śeṣo darśitaḥ / yadyapi sūtrabhāṣyayoḥ 'anubhāti';
GSP33bbdip13u:1387: itiśrutyanusārādanubhānāditi vācyam / tathāpi tāpinī pācinī caiva śoṣiṇī ca prakāśinī /
GSP33bbdip13u:1389_1: darśayitumanukṛterityuktam / sūtre tadanusāribhāṣye ca caśabdo dvitīyasūtrasya vakṣyamāṇavyākhyānabhedena
GSP33bbdip13u:1390_1: vidheyaparasya tattvityasyārthamāha - paramātmaiveti / na tu jñānisukhamityevaśabdārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1390_2: liṅgasamanvayena bhavatphalaṃ darśayati - anirdeśyeti / anirdeśyaścāsau sukharūpaśca iti vā,
GSP33bbdip13u:1391_0: anirdeśyaṃ yatsukhaṃ tadrūpa iti vā vigrahaḥ / atra rūpaśabdo bhinnakramaḥ / tathā
GSP33bbdip13u:1391_1: cānirdeśyaṃ paramaṃ sukhaṃ paramātmarūpamityanvayaḥ / eka ityādau pulliṅgena prakṛtasyaitaditi
GSP33bbdip13u:1391_3: draṣṭavyam / vastutastu - vacanāccetiśabdasya sukharūpaścetyapi sambandhe tenaivānukūlyena
GSP33bbdip13u:1391_4: gṛhyamāṇākhyaḥ sādhyadharmī sūcita iti dhyeyam / yadyapyanirdeśyatvamajñeyatvaṃ cetyupakramādubhayaṃ grāhyaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1393: sukharūpamiti cādhikam / tathāpi pūrvapakṣyuktasukhaśruteḥ sukharūpe brahmaṇi sāvakāśatvajñāpanāya 'tadetat';
GSP33bbdip13u:1394_1: bhāṣye liṅgadvayasyānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasya vā anirdeśyasukharūpasya vā viṣṇutve sādhye
GSP33bbdip13u:1396_0: iti vyavadhānena prakṛtaparamātmagrahaṇe liṅgadvayaṃ hetutvena yojitam / tathāpi
GSP33bbdip13u:1396_1: hetudvayena tacchabdena jñānisukhaparityāgena paramātmana eva grahaṇasiddhau tata
GSP33bbdip13u:1399: kintvanirdeśyaṃ sukhamityatra samīpoktajñānisukhaparityāge heturucyate ityatra jñāpakaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1400: ṭīkāpi tadanusāriṇītyāhuḥ / tathā cāyaṃ siddhānte śrutyarthaḥ -
GSP33bbdip13u:1401: eko vaśī sarvabhūtāntarātmā ekaṃ rūpaṃ bahudhā yaḥ karoti /
GSP33bbdip13u:1404: jñānānandādyabhinnaḥ samābhyadhikaśūnyo vā yaḥ sarvamasya vaśe 'stīti 'sarvavaśī';
GSP33bbdip13u:1410: jñāninaḥ anupaśyantīti prakṛtā ye jñāninasteṣāmeva 'śāśvataṃ sukhaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1411: nityābhivyaktasaukhyaṃ netareṣām / anena brahmasāmarthyamuktaṃ bhavati / evaṃ 'nityo nityānām';
GSP33bbdip13u:1413: ityādināpi prakṛtabhagavatsvarūpameva viśeṣataḥ pratipādyate iti / manyante ityasyottaratrānvayaḥ / tathā ca 'yato vāco nivartante'; (tai. 2-4-1.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1415: ityādau prasiddham anirdeśyaṃ paramaṃ sukhaṃ kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyāmiti manyante ityānukūlyena gṛhṇanti / jñānārthaṃ tadbhānaṃ vā prārthayante / 'kimu bhāti na bhāti vā';
GSP33bbdip13u:1416_0: iti tasya durjñeyatvaṃ ca vadanti jñāninaḥ / tat brahmaṇo rūpaṃ svarūpabhūtaṃ sukhametadekaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1416_1: rūpaṃ bahudhā yaḥ karotītiprakṛteśvararūpābhinnamiti manyante jñānina iti / etacchabdasyeśvaraparatve
GSP33bbdip13u:1419: iti jīvasya pratibimbatvamuktam / rūpaśabdena prakṛtametat 'ekaṃ rūpam';
GSP33bbdip13u:1421_0: itthamiti sākalyena nirvaktumaśakyaṃ paramaṃ sukhamiti manyante jñānina iti sukharūpatvavidhiparatayā
GSP33bbdip13u:1421_3: kimu bhāti na bhāti veti samyagbhāti na bhātīti kathaṃ nvahaṃ jānīyāmiti śiṣṭavākyārthastatraivoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1425_0: na kenāpi prakāreṇeti / atretiśabda ubhayānvayī / tathā ca kimu bhātīti praśnasyottarabhūtaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1427_0: prārthanīyāṃ liṅ / na kathamapītyarthaḥ / jñānivākyānukaraṇametat / bhagavatprasādādapi
GSP33bbdip13u:1427_1: kiṃ sākalyena tajjñānaṃ bhavatīti naciketā yamaṃ pṛcchati - kimu bhātīti / uśabdaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:1427_2: samyagityarthe / kimvityekaṃ vā / tathātve samyagiti śeṣaḥ / uttaramāha yamaḥ - na
GSP33bbdip13u:1430: na hi jñānisukhamanubhāti sarvaṃ, na ca tadbhāsā /
GSP33bbdip13u:1434: itivākye ca sarvasya jagatastatprabhāprakāśyatvasya ca śravaṇena asiddhiparihāre kutastayorviṣṇutvasādhyenāvyabhicaritatvam,
GSP33bbdip13u:1435: yena talliṅgadvayabalātsamīpoktajñānisukhapāmarśaparityāgaḥ syādityata āha - na hīti // sarvamityubhayānvayī / bhātīti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca 'hi';
GSP33bbdip13u:1441: na prakāśate cetyarthaḥ / vakṣyamāṇapramāṇavirodhāditi bhāvaḥ / caśabdaḥ samuccaye / ato na liṅgadvayamanyatrāvakāśavaditi vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1444: 'ahaṃ tattejo raśmīt'; iti nārāyaṇabhāsā hi sarvaṃ bhāti // 22 //
GSP33bbdip13u:1446: astvetadubhayaṃ jñānisukhe 'nupapannam / tathāpyanena kutaḥ paramātmano grahaṇaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1447_1: sūcitāṃ śrutimāha - ahamiti // ahamitītyanantaraṃ śruteriti śeṣaḥ / itiśabda ādyārthe /
GSP33bbdip13u:1447_2: tena 'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'; (kaṭha. 5-15.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1448: ityātharvaṇaśrutirapi gṛhyate / nārāyaṇeti / nārāyaṇādhīnabhāsetyarthaḥ / hiśabdo yata ityarthe,
GSP33bbdip13u:1457: 'tejaḥ'; ityanena sarvasya jagato nārāyaṇīyaprakāśaprakāśyatvasya coktatvāditi bhāvaḥ / 'aham'; iti,
GSP33bbdip13u:1458: śrutistvantarnaye vyākhyātā / anena - taduktamityataḥ sūtre tadityanuvartate / tasyetyāvartate vipariṇamyate ca / asambhavāditi cānuvartate / tathā ca -
GSP33bbdip13u:1461: ityānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇaṃ tadetacchabdaparāmṛśyaṃ sukham anirdeśyaṃ sukhaṃ tattu viṣṇurūpameva,
GSP33bbdip13u:1467_1: yāvat / tathā tasya sarvasya jagatastasya tatprakāśaprakāśyatvasya 'tasya bhāsā'; (kaṭha. 5-15.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1468: iti śrutāvuktatvāttasya sarvajagatprakāśatvokteriti yāvat / tasya ca liṅgadvayasya 'ahaṃ tattejaḥ'; (caturvedaśikhā.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1469: ityādiśrutyā smṛtyā ca tasminviṣṇāveva niścayenopapatterjñānisukhe ca 'asambhavāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:1470: anupapatteḥ / tathā tasminnupasaṃhāre tasyānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasya 'na tatra sūryo bhāti';
GSP33bbdip13u:1471: iti vākye tasya sūryādyaprakāśyatvasyacokteśceti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1478: yaccandramasi yaccāgnau tattejo viddhi māmakam // (gī. 15-12.) iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:1481: iti śrutyopapāditam / tatsmṛtyāpyupapādayatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā tāṃ smṛtimudāharati - apīti // iti smaryata ityanvayaḥ / 'yat';
GSP33bbdip13u:1488: na tadbhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅko na pāvakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1489: yadgatvā na nivartante taddhāma paramaṃ mama // (gī. 15.6.) iti ca // 23 //
GSP33bbdip13u:1492: kiṃ ca pāṭhake 'na tatra sūryo bhāti na candratārakaṃ nemā vidyuto bhānti kuto 'yamagniḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1493: ityādyānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasya sukhasya sūryādyaprakāśyatvamucyate / tacca viṣṇoreva smaryate,
GSP33bbdip13u:1495: na jñānisukhamiti sūtrasyārthāntaramapipadasya yuktisamuccayārthatvaṃ cābhipretya tāṃ smṛtimudāharati - na taditi // atrāpītiśabdasya smaryata ityanvayaḥ / jñānino 'yadgatvā';
GSP33bbdip13u:1500: candraḥ / yadā caivaṃ tadā kuto 'yamavamo 'gniriti gītāsmṛtyarthaḥ / anena - pūrvavyākhyāne na kevalamanukṛtyādiḥ 'ahaṃ tattejaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1503: kintu yadādityeti smaryatepīti śrutisamuccayārthe 'piśabdaḥ / dvitīyavyākhyāne tu 'tameva bhāntamanubhāti';
GSP33bbdip13u:1505: iti pūrvavākyoktasūryādyaprakāśyatvahetośca samuccaye 'piśabdaḥ / tathā ca na kevalaṃ 'tadetat';
GSP33bbdip13u:1506: ityatroktānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasya viṣṇutvarūpapradhānasādhye hetūkṛtamanukṛtyādikam 'ahaṃ tattejo raśmīt'; ityādau śrūyate,
GSP33bbdip13u:1507: kintu yadādityeti smaryate 'pīti vā apiḥ / kiñca - yato na kevalaṃ prathamasūtroktaliṅgadvayaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1509: iti kāṭhakavākye tasyānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasyoktaṃ sūryādyaprakāśyatvarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya viṣṇoḥ sambandhitvenaiva 'na tat';
GSP33bbdip13u:1511: ityatra viṣṇureva pratipādya iti vā sūtrasyārthadvayamuktaṃ bhavati / 'na tatra';
GSP33bbdip13u:1512: ityāderayamarthaḥ / pūrvaṃ brahma na samyagbhātīti tasya durjñeyatvamuktaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1513: tatkuta ityataḥ idamucyate - yasyaivaṃvidhaṃ sukhaṃ rūpaṃ 'tatra';
GSP33bbdip13u:1515: tanna prakāśayatīti yāvat / candratārakamiti dvandvaikavadbhāvaḥ/ evaṃ tat vidyuto 'pi 'na bhānti';
GSP33bbdip13u:1527: prakāśyata iti vyākhyeyam / vyāsatīrthīyaṃ tu vyākhyānāntaraṃ ṭīkākṛdabhipretaṃ bhaviṣyatīti tadvirodhaḥ // 6 //
GSP33bbdip13u:1532: viṣṇureva jijñāsya ityuktam / tatra ūrdhvaṃ prāṇāmunnayatyapānaṃ pratyagasyati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1536_0: atrādhikaraṇer iśānanāmasamanvayaḥ kriyate / śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayasaṃśayau ca sūcayati
GSP33bbdip13u:1536_2: na ca tatra jijñāsyatvāyogavyavaccheda eva kṛtaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1537: na tvanyayogavyavaccheda iti vācyam / anyasyāpi jijñāsyatve tasyāpi mokṣadātṛtvāpattyā 'yato nārāyaṇaprasādamṛte';
GSP33bbdip13u:1538_1: ubhayānvayitayā vyākhyeyaḥ / tataḥ kimityata āha - tatreti / idaṃ cāvartate / tatretyavyayaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1546_0: tairjijñāsyaḥ pratīyate ata iti vākyayojanā / na ca vāyoḥ sarvadevopāsyatve 'pi na
GSP33bbdip13u:1546_2: iti niyamasyāsiddheḥ / na ca śrutigataviśvedevaśabdasya gaṇaviśeṣavācitvāt sarvadevopāsya
GSP33bbdip13u:1546_3: ityuktiranupapanneti vācyam / gaṇaviśeṣaparatve tasya guṇādhikyāsiddhyā sarvadevaparatvāvaśyaṃbhāvāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:1546_5: jijñāsādhikaraṇenāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā bhavati / tatheśānākhyo viṣayaśca sūcitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1549: sa ca 'evamevaiṣa prāṇa itarān prāṇān pṛthakpṛthageva sannidhatte';
GSP33bbdip13u:1559: sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - sa ceti // atretthaṃ yojanā - 'sa ca';
GSP33bbdip13u:1560: sarvadevopāsyaśceśāno vāyureva bhavet, na viṣṇuḥ / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:1561: atra prāṇavyavasthāpakatvaśravaṇāt / tathā madhyamatvokteḥ sarvadevatopāsyatvokteśca / na caiṣāṃ vāyvekaniṣṭhatvāsiddhiḥ / yato 'yaṃ vāyuḥ 'evamevaiṣa prāṇaḥ'; (praśna. 3-4.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1563: ityādinā vākyena prāṇavyavasthāpakatvadimān pratīyate, ata iti / kāṭhake hi -
GSP33bbdip13u:1567: ityādinā mahimāntaramucyate / tatra madhyaśabdaḥ siddhānte ūrdhvaṃpratyakchabdasamabhivyāhārāt deśaviśeṣavacanaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1570: udgamayati ūrdhvagatimattayā prerayati / apānarūpī cāpānākhyaṃ vāyuṃ 'pratyak';
GSP33bbdip13u:1575: saundaryapradhānāḥ striyo vāmāḥ tāḥ netāraṃ viṣṇuṃ 'viśve devāḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1577: jijñāsanta iti siddhāntarītyā śrutyarthaḥ / pūrvapakṣī tvidaṃ vāyuparaṃ matvā madhyaśabdo 'yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1580: iti dṛṣṭāntavākyena saha vyākhyeyam / tatprakārastu - yathā 'samrāṭ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1587: bhinnān svajanyatvenopacāreṇātmapravibhāgān prāṇān vāyūn pṛthaksthāneṣu hṛdayādiṣu sthāpayatīti / 'yo 'yam';
GSP33bbdip13u:1588: ityādibṛhadāraṇyakavākyam / tatra hi pūrvaṃ vāgādīnāṃ mṛtyugrastatvamuktvā 'athainameva nāpnot';
GSP33bbdip13u:1591: na tu madhyadeśasthatvam / tathā tatraiva caturthādhyāye 'ayaṃ vāva śiśuḥ yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ'; (bṛ. 4-2-1.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1592: iti candrikodāhṛte vākye sthūladehākhyavistṛtapradeśagataliṅgaśarīrarūpagṛhe viṣṇurūpāyāṃ sthūṇāyām annākhyena śrīrūpeṇa dāmnā baddho govatsarūpovāyurmadhyamatvenocyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1593: kuvidaṅga namasā ye vṛdhāsaḥ purā devā anavadyāsa āsan /
GSP33bbdip13u:1596: iti priyasambodhanam / tathā ca ye devāḥ vāyoḥ 'namasā';
GSP33bbdip13u:1599: anavadyāḥ ajñānarāgādyavadyavidhurāśca purā sasūryā āsan / te 'kuvit';
GSP33bbdip13u:1607_0: vāmanaśruteḥ / evakāro vāyuliṅgasadbhāvāt vāyureveśānaḥ kiṃ na syāditi codyaparihārāya
GSP33bbdip13u:1607_1: liṅgebhyaḥ śruteḥ prābalyamāha / yathoktaṃ sudhāyām - evaśabdavyākhyānaṃ balavaditi
GSP33bbdip13u:1608_1: āvartate cāyam / itiśabdātparamapi evaśabdo yojyaḥ / tenānuvṛttastu śabdo vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1609: iti śrutar iśāno viṣṇureva bhavet / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:1610: yastatra pramito viṣṇāveva mahāyogavidvadrūḍhibhyāṃ prasiddho 'madhye vāmanam';
GSP33bbdip13u:1611: itiśruto vāmanaśabdastasmādeveti yojanā / pramitapadaṃ śruterniravakāśatvasūcakam / anena sūtre itiśabdo 'dhyāhārya iti sūcitam / tathā car 'iśāno bhūtabhavyasya';
GSP33bbdip13u:1614: yastatra viṣṇāveva pramito mahāyogavidvadrūḍhibhyāṃ prasiddho 'nyatra niravakāśo 'madhye vāmanamāsīnam'; (kaṭha. 5-3.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1620_0: sūtre evakāraprayogena sūcitaṃ śruteḥ prābalyaṃ liṅgasya prābalyaniṣedhamukhena darśayati
GSP33bbdip13u:1620_1: - na hīti // śruteriti pañcamī / hiśabdo vakṣyamāṇapramāṇavirodhāditi hetusūcakaḥ / tathā ca 'hi';
GSP33bbdip13u:1622: kintu durbalameva / tasmālliṅagāt prabalāt vāmanaśabdādeveśāno viṣṇurevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1625: śrutirliṅgaṃ samākhyā ca vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tathā /
GSP33bbdip13u:1626: pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ balīyaḥ syādevamāgamanirṇayaḥ / iti skānde /
GSP33bbdip13u:1628_1: tadvākyaṃ paṭhati - śrutiriti // iti skānda ityanantaraṃ vacanāditi śeṣaḥ / asya
GSP33bbdip13u:1629_0: tadbodhakaśabdo vā liṅgam / nirṇītasyānyatra samānoktiḥ samākhyā / sā dvividhā -
GSP33bbdip13u:1631: na tvatroktakramānusāreṇa vākyādyapekṣayā prāthamyam / atroktakramasyāvivakṣitatvāt / uktaṃ hi pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyāṃ - samākhyāditvena grahaṇaṃ 'śrutirliṅgaṃ samākhyā ca';
GSP33bbdip13u:1632: ityavivakṣitakramaṃ vākyamanusṛtyeti / ata eva jaiminiḥ - 'śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānāṃ samavāye pāradaurbalyamarthaviprakarṣāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:1633: iti smṛtyuktādanyathākramamāha - pūrvaṃpūrvamiti / pūrvoddiṣṭamityarthaḥ / ekatra samavetaṃ viruddhamiti ca śeṣaḥ / 'balīyaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1634_0: atiśayena svabhāvato balavat yathātraivādhikaraṇe anantaroddiṣṭaliṅgāpekṣayā pūrvoddiṣṭā
GSP33bbdip13u:1634_1: vāmanaśrutiḥ svataḥ prabalā / vākyāpekṣayā prabalaṃ liṅgam / yathā - daharādhikaraṇe
GSP33bbdip13u:1634_2: daharākāśasya sākṣātsarvādhāratvaprāpakāt 'kiṃ tadatra vidyate ..... ubhe asmin dyāvāpṛthivī'; (chāṃ. 8-1-2,3.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1635: iti vākyātprabalaṃ viṣṇostatprāpakāpahatapāpmatvādikaṃ liṅgam / prakaraṇāpekṣayā prabalaṃ vākyam/ yathā - jyotirdarśanāt ityadhikaraṇe jīvasya 'hṛdyantarjyotiḥ'; (bṛ. 6-3-7.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1637: iti praśnavākyam / sthānāpekṣayā prabalaṃ prakaraṇam / yathā - samagropaniṣadar iśvaraparatvasādhakāt ṣaṭpraśnarūpasthānāt prabalam 'ātmata eṣa prāṇo jāyate'; (praśna. 3-3.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1638_1: mukhyaprāṇaliṅgatvamupetya śrutyā bādha uktaḥ / samākhyāpekṣayā prabalaṃ sthānam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1639_0: iti nārāyaṇānuvākasamākhyāyāḥ prabalaṃ teṣāṃ viṣṇutvasādhakaṃ brahmaparānekaprakaraṇasandarbharūpaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1639_1: sthānam / etānyeva śrutyādinār'thanirṇayasthalāni / ādyayā samākhyayā nirṇetavyaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1639_2: yathā - puruṣasūktasamākhyayā vaiśvānarasya viṣṇutvam / dvitīyayā yathā - ambhraṇīsūktasamākhyayā
GSP33bbdip13u:1639_3: viśvakarmasūktoktasyājasya viṣṇutvam / astvevaṃ tataḥ kimityata āha - evamiti / viruddhaiteṣāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1639_4: samavāye sati prabalena pūrveṇottarabādhe ca sati 'āgamanirṇayaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1643: tacca liṅgaṃ viṣṇoreva / tasyaiva prāṇatvokteḥ 'tadvai tvaṃ prāṇo
GSP33bbdip13u:1646_0: nanvastu śruteḥ svabhāvataḥ prābalyam / tathāpi bāhulyena pūrvapakṣyuktaliṅgānāmapi
GSP33bbdip13u:1646_1: prābalyātsāmyenānirṇaya evetyata āha - tacceti // castvarthaḥ / liṅgamiti samudāyaikavacanam / tathā ca 'tat';
GSP33bbdip13u:1648: na vāyorityarthaḥ / tathā ca bāhulye 'pi liṅgānāṃ sāvakāśatvāttebhyaḥ śruterekasyā api niravakāśāyāḥ prābalyānnānirṇaya iti bhāvaḥ / nanu na liṅgaṃ viṣṇau sāvakāśaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1653_0: ityatrāntaryāmiparatvaṃ bruvatā sūtrakāreṇetaravyāvṛttyā tasyaiva prāṇatvokteḥ sādhitatvādityapi
GSP33bbdip13u:1653_1: vyākhyeyametat / tathā ca śrutyantare prāṇaniṣṭhatayā liṅgasyoktāvapi na tadvirodhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1653_2: tasya prāṇasya viṣṇutvābhyupagamāditi bhāvaḥ / nanu tathāpi 'kuvidaṅga';
GSP33bbdip13u:1654_0: iti ṛci vāyuniṣṭhatayā liṅgoktestadvirodha ityasyāpīdamevottaram / asmin pakṣe prāṇatvamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:1654_1: vāyutvamupalakṣyate / tathā cāntarnaye ādhidaivikāśeṣaśabdasamanvayaṃ bruvatā sūtrakāreṇa 'tasyaiva';
GSP33bbdip13u:1656: vāyuśabdavācyatvarūpavāyutsyoktatvādityarthaḥ / tathā ca na tadvirodhopīti bhāvaḥ / na ca siddhānte 'pi sthānāpekṣayā prabalātprakaraṇāt 'evamevaiṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1661_0: tatroktaliṅgānāmapi tatparatvamupetya teṣāṃ śrutyā bādhasyoktatvāt kathaṃ śrutyantarasthaprāṇavāyuśabdayoḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:1661_1: viṣṇuparatvāṅgīkāreṇa samādhānam / ata eva candrikāyām - madhyamaśabdo 'pi 'ūrdhvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1663: na tu śrutyantare madhyamaśabdoktaprāṇapara ityuktam / ataḥ 'evamevaiṣaḥ'; (praśna. 3-4.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1664_0: iti vākyaṃ sthānātprakaraṇasya prābalye udāhṛtamiti vācyam / uktarītyā mukhyataḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:1664_3: vā nānupapattiḥ / na caivaṃ kāṭhakoktaliṅgānāmapyanyaniṣṭhatvāpattyā anyeṣāmīśānatvādyāpattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1664_4: niravakāśaśrutyā kāṭhakoktaliṅgānāṃ viṣṇuniṣṭhatānirṇayopapatteḥ / nanu tathāpi kathamīśāno
GSP33bbdip13u:1664_6: na ca vyomavatsarvagatasyāpyaṇutvaṃ yujyata iti pratipāditamiti vācyam / tathāpi 'aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1667: na tvavadhāraṇārthako mātraśabdaḥ / 'dehāṅguṣṭhamito dehe jīvāṅguṣṭhamito hṛdi';
GSP33bbdip13u:1668: iti smṛtau mita ityanena parimāṇasyaivokteḥ / tathā ca nānupapattiriti vācyam / tathātve 'ṅguṣṭhamātratvābhidhātryām 'aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ'; (kaṭha. 4-12.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1670_0: ityasya smṛtau hṛdītyasya ca vaiyarthyāpātāt / tanmātraparimitatvoktyarthaṃ hi tatra
GSP33bbdip13u:1678_0: tathā ca sarvagate harāvaṅguṣṭhamātratvoktiranupapanneti nātreśāno viṣṇurityāśaṅkāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1678_1: pariharatsūtramupanyasya tadakṣarāṇi vyācaṣṭe - hṛdīti // sarvagatasyāpītyanena tuśabdo
GSP33bbdip13u:1678_3: sādhyaṃ darśayati - tasyeti / yojanā tu - yadyapi viṣṇuḥ sarvagatastathāpi 'tasyāṅguṣṭhamātratvam';
GSP33bbdip13u:1682_1: vinā yojanā / prathamapakṣe śaktyāparimite 'pi bhagavati mūrtiviśeṣe vyaktyātmanāṅguṣṭhamātratvasya
GSP33bbdip13u:1682_2: sthānini brahmaṇi tatsambandhādupacāreṇoktiriti bhedaḥ / atra ṭīkāyāṃ hṛdyavakāśāpekṣayeti
GSP33bbdip13u:1682_3: bhāṣyaṃ sāvadhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā sautratuśabdo 'vadhāraṇatayā vyākhyātaḥ / tena viṣṇoṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ hṛdyapekṣayaiva,
GSP33bbdip13u:1683: na tu lokavatparicchinnatvādityuktaṃ bhavati / tattatsthāneṣu vyaktamūrtiviśeṣāpekṣayā vā upacāreṇa vā tattatparimāṇatvoktyā 'yastvetameva prādeśamātram'; (chāṃ. 5-18-1.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1686: ityaparatra ca hṛdgatasya viṣṇoḥ prādeśaparimitatvokteḥ / 'aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo 'ṅguṣṭhaṃ ca samāśritaḥ'; (mahānā. 16.3.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1690_0: iti kvacidaṅguṣṭhāgrapramāṇakatvoktervirodha iti codyaṃ parihṛtaṃ bhavati / dehe
GSP33bbdip13u:1695: mūleśa iti nāmāsmin sarve jīvāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ //
GSP33bbdip13u:1697: prāviśanti suṣuptau tu prabudhyante tatastathā // iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1698: asmin mūleśavyāpinormadhye 'ṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ ca dehe dehāṅguṣṭhamitatvaṃ jīvahṛdi jīvāṅguṣṭhamitatvamiti vivektavyam / atra 'aṅguṣṭhaṃ ca samāśritaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1699: ityanena karmendriyādhiṣṭhitatvamucyata iti prameyadīpoktamapi jñātavyam / nanu 'dakṣiṇākṣimukhe viśvo manasyantastu taijasaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1700_1: tāvatsiddham / yadi caivaṃ tadā jīvo 'pi jāgradavasthāyāṃ dakṣiṇākṣisthaḥ svapne
GSP33bbdip13u:1702: ityukteḥ / dūrastho 'kṣistho jāgrajjāgratvamiti tasyārthaḥ / tathā ca kathaṃ hṛdayavyāptaprādeśaparimitabhagavadrūpasya sarvadā jīvasthānatvam?
GSP33bbdip13u:1703: kathaṃ ca hṛtkarṇikāmūlagatabhagavadrūpe sadā pratiṣṭhito jīvaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:1704: suptau hṛtkarṇikāgragate harau praviśatītyuktiriti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip13u:1705_0: yatassarvadā hṛdi sthitameva jīvasvarūpaṃ jāgaritādāvakṣyādiṣvapi viśeṣasannihitaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1705_1: dīpaprakāśavadityaṅgīkṛtam / yathoktamaitareyabhāṣye - hṛde sthitameva tasya rūpaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1705_3: anekadhā sthitānāṃ bhagavanmūrtīnāṃ śaktyā sarvagānāmapi tatra tatra vyaktyātmanā
GSP33bbdip13u:1705_4: anekālpaparimāṇavattvaṃ ca yujyata iti na kācidanupapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1711: nanu tathāpi nāṅguṣṭhaparimāṇavattvaṃ viṣṇoryuktam / tathā hi kiṃ tattadaṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ vā yatkiñcidaṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ vā / nādyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1713_2: pariharan manuṣyādhikāratvāt itisūtraśeṣaṃ tuśabdasya kākākṣinyāyena atrāpyanvayaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1713_3: tasyāpyarthatvaṃ ca abhipretya tatsambandhipradarśanapūrvakaṃ vyācaṣṭe - itareti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1718: manuṣyamātrādhikāratvāditi yojanā / sūtre bhāṣye ca manuṣyāṇāmadhikāro yasmin athavā - adhikriyate 'tretyadhikāra upāsanaṃ śāstraṃ vā,
GSP33bbdip13u:1720_0: itipāṭhe manuṣyā adhikāriṇo yasmin tattathoktam / tathā ca manuṣyādhikārikatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1720_1: manuṣyapadaṃ ca vakṣyamāṇanyāyena mananādiśīlacetanaparam / tena devānāṃ jaritāryādīnāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1722_0: nopāstāvapi / ata eva ṭīkāyāṃ manuṣyāṇāmeva vedavidyopāsanādhikāritveneti manuṣyatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1722_1: vyāpakatvenoktam / na cānadhikāriṇāṃ paśvādīnāṃ dehasthitasya bhagavato 'ṅguṣṭhaparimitatvābhāve
GSP33bbdip13u:1722_3: tadanusāriparimāṇavattvāt / yathoktamaitareyabhāṣye - saṅkarṣaṇaśca pradyumnastadākārau nṛṣu sthitau /
GSP33bbdip13u:1724_0: anena - sūtre tuśabdo 'pyarthevadhāraṇe ca / tatrāpyarthasyobhayatrānvayaḥ / aṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1724_1: yujyata iti śeṣaḥ / taditi pradhānasūtrādanuvṛttasyeha vipariṇāmenānvayaḥ / na virodhaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:1727: taduktiryujyate / na ca virodhaḥ / yato 'tra 'hṛdyapekṣayā tu';
GSP33bbdip13u:1729: na tu paricchinnatvāt / tacca mūrtiviśeṣe tanmātratvasya sattvādupacāreṇa vā yujyate / na ca nāṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ viṣṇoryuktaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1730: yatkiñcidaṅguṣṭhamātratvoktervyarthatvenāsambhavena ca tattadaṅguṣṭhamātratve vācye tasya ca paśvādīnāmaṅguṣṭhābhāvena tadantargataviṣṇāvayogāditi vācyam / yataḥ 'tu';
GSP33bbdip13u:1744: asminnadhikaraṇe devānāṃ brahmavidyādhikāraḥ samarthyate / prāsaṅgikatvānnādhyāyapādasaṅgatī mārgaṇīye / śrutyādisaṅgativiṣayasaṃśayatadbījāni darśayati - manuṣyāṇāmiti // 'uktaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1745: pūrvasūtre / tuśabdārthāvadhāraṇasya samāsapraviṣṭamanuṣyapadenāpi sambandho 'stīti bhāvena manuṣyāṇāmevetyanuvādaḥ / netareṣāmityevaśabdārthaḥ / 'vedavidyādhikāro';
GSP33bbdip13u:1750: iti śruteśca koṭidvayopasthāpakatvena sandehabījatvāttaduktyaiva devānāmadhikāro 'sti uta nāstīti saṃśayo,
