GSP33bbdip13u:2210_3: prati munerupadeśāsambhavāt / pautrāyaṇasya arthācchrutāvadhikārokteśceti vā yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:2210_4: adhikāra ityanantaramato virodha ityanukṛṣyate / tasyokta ityanenānvayaḥ / anenoktanyāyena
GSP33bbdip13u:2213_0: chāndogye caturthādhyāye saṃvargaprakaraṇe hītthamākhyāyikā - pautrāyaṇo nāma rājā
GSP33bbdip13u:2213_1: prāsādāgre niśāyāṃ śayāno 'bhūt / tadā prāsādopari haṃsapakṣiṇo 'gaman / uparipatatāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2213_2: parasparaṃ vārtāṃ kurvatāṃ teṣāṃ madhye dvāvagragāmināvāstām / tatraika ekamuvāca / kimiti?
GSP33bbdip13u:2214_0: are pautrāyaṇīyaṃ tejastvaṃ māgamaḥ / tatsambandhe tadīyaṃ tejastvāṃ dahediti / evamuktaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:2214_1: paro haṃsaḥ kamityākṣepavacanena rājānamanādṛtya raikvamunimeva praśaśaṃsa / tacchrutvā
GSP33bbdip13u:2214_3: sa tatra tatra raikvamanviṣyan nāvidamiti prathamamāgataḥ / punastallakṣaṇoktipūrvakaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2214_4: rājñā tanmārgaṇāyādiṣṭaḥ punaranviyaṣya kvacitpradeśe raikvamavalokya punā rājānaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2214_5: pratyetyāha - raikvamavidamiti yathāvṛttamavadat / tadā rājā svasārathivacanena raikvamunisthānaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2214_6: niścitya tasmāttattvaṃ vividiṣurgurudakṣiṇāṃ gṛhītvā tatsamīpaṃ jagāma / atha dvāri
GSP33bbdip13u:2214_7: śakaṭasyādhasthāt sthitaṃ raikvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sambodhya dakṣiṇāṃ nivedya mahyaṃ vidyāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2214_8: brūhītyuvāca / tadā taṃ pautrāyaṇaṃ paro lokavilakṣaṇo raikvaḥ pratyācakhyau / kimiti?
GSP33bbdip13u:2216_0: hāra itveti bhinnapadatve visargalope guṇe hāretveti bhavati / tathā ca he śūdra
GSP33bbdip13u:2216_1: hāraḥ kaṇṭhamālākhyaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ itvā rathaḥ / tattvapradīparītyā śakaṭo vā / gobhissaha
GSP33bbdip13u:2216_2: tavāstvityarthaḥ hāretvānāvityekapadatvapakṣe dvivacanasya ekavacanādeśo vā ākārādeśo
GSP33bbdip13u:2216_3: vā kartavyaḥ / pratyekaṃ ca astu iti kriyāsambandhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2225: siddhāntayatsūtramavatārayati - ata iti // aviśeṣākhyayukteḥ śravaṇasūtre nirākariṣyamāṇatvāt,
GSP33bbdip13u:2226: pūrvapakṣyuktaliṅgadarśanasya anyathopapattipradarśanāya pravṛttasya tadādravaṇādityasya anvayayogyārthākāṃkṣotthāpakaṃ sūtrasya phalitārthaṃ darśayati - neti / 'asau';
GSP33bbdip13u:2227: raikveṇa sambodhitaḥ pautrāyaṇo 'na śūdraḥ'; jātyā śūdro na,
GSP33bbdip13u:2228_0: kintu kṣatriya ityarthaḥ / tarhi kathamasya śūdreti sambodhitatvaṃ yujyate rūḍhyabhāvādityato
GSP33bbdip13u:2231_0: na tu jātirityarthaḥ / anena tadādravaṇādityasya sūtre śūdratvamityadhyāhṛtena śūdreti
GSP33bbdip13u:2231_1: sambodhitatvarūpārthabodhakena padenānvayaḥ sūcitaḥ / tathā ca na sambodhanānupapattiriti
GSP33bbdip13u:2231_2: nedaṃ śūdrasya vedavidyādhikāre liṅgamityato na śūdrasya vedavidyādhikāra iti nañāvṛttyā
GSP33bbdip13u:2231_3: anvayaḥ / evetyanena ayaṃ śūdraśabdaḥ śucādravaṇācchūdra iti nairukta eva,
GSP33bbdip13u:2233_0: ityuṇādisūtreṇa rapratyaye dhātoścadīrghe cakārasya dakārādeśe ca niṣpanno rūḍha
GSP33bbdip13u:2233_1: ityuktaṃ bhavati / pautrāyaṇa ityanena buddhisthaparāmarśakedaṃśabdārthaḥ śucetyanena
GSP33bbdip13u:2234: tvapratyayena nimittārthakapañcamyarthaśca darśitaḥ / sūtrakārasya sadā sarvajñatvena śugasyetyuktiḥ / bhāṣye 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2240: kasmānnimittādasya śoka ityasyottaratayā pravṛttaṃ śugasya tadanādaraśravaṇāditisūtrakhaṇḍaṃ vyācaṣṭe - kamvara iti // kaṃ u are iti padacchedaḥ / 'are';
GSP33bbdip13u:2245: evaṃ vaktuṃ raikva eva yogya ityarthaḥ / 'etatsantaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2247_0: atra santamiti vā / ityanādaraśravaṇāditi / anādaro nindā / tathā ca ityevaṃrūpasya
GSP33bbdip13u:2247_1: haṃsakṛtānādarabodhakavākyasya haṃsāt svānādaravākyasya vā śravaṇādityarthaḥ / śravaṇādityanantaraṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2250: 'sa ha sañjihāna eva kṣattāramuvāca'; (chāṃ.4.1.5.) iti sūcyate hi // 34 //
GSP33bbdip13u:2252_0: nanu śrutānādarasyāpi rājñaḥ kuḥ śokotpattiḥ jñāyate / na ca pratyakṣāttanniścayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2252_2: ca kāraṇānumānāt kāryānumitiḥ / kāraṇasya kāryāvinābhāvābhāvādityataḥ pravṛttaṃ 'sūcyate hi';
GSP33bbdip13u:2256: sārathiṃ prati raikvagaveṣaṇāyovāceti śrutyarthaḥ / iti sūcyate hīti / ityetadvākyārthānyathānupapattyā jñātena raikve vyāsaktamanaskatvena kāryeṇa tatkāraṇaṃ śugasya 'sūcyate';
GSP33bbdip13u:2257_0: jñāyata ityarthaḥ / kāraṇasya kāryāvinābhāvābhāve 'pi kāryasya kāraṇāvinābhāvasyāvaśyaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2257_1: bhāvāditi bhāvaḥ / asya tadanādarasya śravaṇāt prāptayā śucā'dravaṇameveti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2257_2: śokenādravaṇākhyanimittaparijñānaṃ ca raikvamuneḥ sārvajñyādupapadyate / taduktaṃ chāndogyabhāṣye -
GSP33bbdip13u:2262: ityasmāt kvipi rūpametat tathātve yata iti śeṣaḥ / nanu sūtre taddravaṇādityetāvatā pūrtau āṅpraśleṣaḥ kimartha iti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip13u:2263_0: śrutau śūdretivaktavyatve 'pi śokādhikyajñāpanārthaṃ śūdreti ūkārarūpo yo dīrghasvaraḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:2263_1: śrutaḥ tadarthavyaktavyarthatvāt / na ca śūgdretivaktavye śrutau śūdretyuktiḥ kathamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:2264: iti śrutau gakārasya dakārādeśena yathāprayogastathopapatteḥ / ata eva tattvapradīpe tṛtīyasya tṛtīyo 'tiśayārthatvādityuktam / 'rujaṃ drāvayate';
GSP33bbdip13u:2266: raikvaṃ prati śīghragamanādeva nimittādasya pautrāyaṇasya śūdratvaṃ śūdreti sambodhitatvam,
GSP33bbdip13u:2267: na tu varṇāvaratvāt / śukca śokaścāsya tadanādaraśravaṇādāsīt / taditi śrutyuktaparāmarśaḥ/ kriyākartṛbhāvaṣṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ / tathā ca 'tasya anādaraśravaṇāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:2268_1: madhyamapadalopī samāsa iti kecit / nanu śrutānādarasyāpi kutaḥ śokotpattirjñāyate,
GSP33bbdip13u:2269: parabuddheḥ śokapadoktaduḥkhānubhavasya apratyakṣatvādityata uktaṃ - sūcyate hīti // 'hi';
GSP33bbdip13u:2271: iti vākyārthānupapatyā jñātena tadvyagramanaskatvākhyakāryeṇa tatkāraṇaṃ śugasya 'sūcyate';
GSP33bbdip13u:2272: jñāyate / tasmāt ato na śūdreti sambodhanaṃ śūdrasya vedādhikāre liṅgamiti naitadbalācchūdrasya vedavidyādhikāra iti bhāvaḥ iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2278: 'ayamaśvatarī rathaḥ'; iti citrarathasambandhitvena liṅgena pautrāyaṇasya kṣatriyatvāvagateśca /
GSP33bbdip13u:2281_0: rūḍhārtha eva kiṃ na syāt / yogarūḍhyormadhye rūḍhereva prābalyāt / tathā ca pautrāyaṇanidarśanenaiva
GSP33bbdip13u:2281_1: śūdrasya vedavidyādhikārasiddhirityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - kṣatriyatveti / atra 'ayam';
GSP33bbdip13u:2283: iti sautrapadaṃ sambandhanīyam / śruteneti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca uttaratra raikvaṃ prati pautrāyaṇasya ādravaṇāt,
GSP33bbdip13u:2284: uttaratra tatpratipādanānantaram / yadvā - śūdraśabdena sambodhanāt uttaratra 'ayamaśvatarī rathaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2285_0: iti śrutenetyarthaḥ / pautrāyaṇena dīyamānasya rathasya anyadīyatvaśaṅkānirāsāya
GSP33bbdip13u:2285_1: sūtre caitraratheneti bhāvapradhānapadaṃ prayuktam / anyathā citrarathenetyevāvakṣyat /
GSP33bbdip13u:2285_2: tatra citraścāsau rathaśca citrarathaḥ tasyāyaṃ caitraratha iti vigrahamabhipretya
GSP33bbdip13u:2286: citrapadaṃ tu svarūpakathanārtham / yadvā - apūrvarathayogena kṣatriyatvasambhāvanārthaṃ tatpadam / athavā yadā rathitvenaiva kṣatriyatvasya niścayaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2287: tadā sutarāṃ citrarathitveneti sūcanārthaṃ tatpadam / yadyapi 'ayamaśvatarīrathaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2288: ityatra citrarathamātraśravaṇe 'pi na tatsambandho 'sya śrūyate / tathāpi tatpūrvavākye 'hāretvā tavaiva';
GSP33bbdip13u:2289_0: iti ṣaṣṭhyā itvāśabdārtharathasambandho gamyata iti tasyāśca rathasambandhe śrutirūpatvāt
GSP33bbdip13u:2289_1: yuktamuktam / citro ratho yasyeti citrarathastasya bhāvaḥ caitrarathasteneti vyākhyānaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2289_2: tu bhāve 'ṇ pratyayasya kalpyatvāt śrutibhāṣyaviruddhatvācca ayuktam / na ca caitraratheneti
GSP33bbdip13u:2289_3: sambandhoktimātreṇa kathamanyadīyatvaśaṅkānirāsa iti vācyam / svataḥ prāptatadīyatve
GSP33bbdip13u:2290_1: vyatyayena vyācaṣṭe - liṅganeti / pautrāyaṇasyetyetat asyetyanuvṛttapadasya arthakathanam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2290_2: kṣatriyatvāvagaterityasya śucā'dravaṇādevāsya śūdratvaṃ na tu rūḍhyeti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2291_0: ityādivākyaśeṣoktaṃ liṅgaṃ samuccīyate / liṅgasya śrutitaścaramatvena anekatvena
GSP33bbdip13u:2291_1: ca prābalyasūcanāya vā caśabdaḥ / evaṃ sūtre 'pi caśabdo bhinnakramaḥ uktaprayojanakaśca /
GSP33bbdip13u:2291_2: evaṃ ca rūḍhereva prābalye 'pyatra śrutānekaliṅgarūpabādhakāt śūdraśabdasya yogavṛttyaṅgīkāra
GSP33bbdip13u:2291_3: eva yukta iti bhāvaḥ / 'gardabhādaśvāyāṃ jātā aśvataryaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2293: iti vyāsatīrthīye / tadyukto rathaḥ aśvatarīrathaḥ tava dakṣiṇātvena vartate ityarthaḥ / raikvaṃ prati pautrāyaṇavākyametat /
GSP33bbdip13u:2298_0: nanu śrutāvaśvatarīrathaśabdaprayogāt sūtre 'pi tathaiva prayoktavye kathaṃ sūtrakṛt
GSP33bbdip13u:2298_1: citrarathaśabdaṃ prāyuṅtetyāśaṅkya ubhayorarthaikyānna visaṃvāda ityāśayena tatrābhidhānamāha
GSP33bbdip13u:2298_2: - ratha iti // tuśabdo viśeṣārtho 'vadhāraṇe vā / aśvatarīyukta eveti sambadhyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:2299_0: na tu rathatvasyāpi śakyakoṭipraveśaḥ / tathā ca sūtre rathatvaprakārakabodhāya rathaśabdaprayoga
GSP33bbdip13u:2299_1: iti na tadvaiyarthyamiti dhyeyam iti brāhme uktatvāt na śrutisūtrayorvairūpyamityupaskāreṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2302: yatra vedo rathastatra na vedo yatra no rathaḥ / iti brahmavaivarte // 35 //
GSP33bbdip13u:2304_0: evaṃ sākṣādeva svābhāvikarathena pautrāyaṇasya kṣatriyatvaṃ prasādhitam / svābhāvikarathitve
GSP33bbdip13u:2304_1: 'sya varṇāvaratvaṃ kiṃ na syādityaprayojakatvamāśaṅkya maivam-āgantukasyāpi rathasya
GSP33bbdip13u:2304_2: vedaṃ vināyogāt 'vedasya ca saṃskāreti vakṣyamāṇanyāyena śūdre 'yogāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:2305: rathamātreṇa vedānumānadvārā pautrāyaṇasya śūdratvābhāvasiddherityāśayena rathena vedānumāne vyabhicāraśaṅkāparihārāya āgamenobhayavyāptiṃ darśayati - yatreti / 'tatra';
GSP33bbdip13u:2306_0: tatraivetyarthaḥ / tena yatra vahniḥ tatraiva dhūma ityādāviva vedasya vyāpakatālābhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2306_1: ata eva vyatirekapradarśakāṃśe na veda iti vedabhāvasya prathamamuktiḥ / smṛtau rathaśabdena
GSP33bbdip13u:2307: samavyāptyabhiprāyeṇa vā yatra veda ityuktiḥ / ata eva ṭīkāyāṃ 'rathasya vedāvinābhāvāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:2309_0: ityanena tasya vyāpakatvamuktam / vastutastu - yatra rathastatra veda iti yojanāyāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2309_1: nānupapattiḥ / tathā ca anena vyāptiniścayāt na vyabhicāraśaṅketi yādṛśatādṛśarathamātreṇa
GSP33bbdip13u:2309_3: bhāvaḥ / etena pūrvapakṣiṇā śūdre 'pi vedāṅgīkārānna tena śūdratvābhāvasādhanaṃ yuktamitinirastaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2310_0: tasyottarasūtre nirākariṣyamāṇatvāt / na ca brāhmaṇādisādhāraṇarathitvenāsya vaidikatvaniścaye
GSP33bbdip13u:2310_1: 'pi taddvārā aśūdratvasiddhāvapi kathaṃ kṣatriyatvaniścaya iti vācyam / rathitvamātrasya
GSP33bbdip13u:2310_3: smṛtyabhipretatvāt / tasya ca kādācitkarathavati brāhmaṇādāvabhāvāttena sākṣādeva
GSP33bbdip13u:2311_1: iti vācyam / apalāyanena yoddhṛtvasya padātitayopapattyā rathitvānākṣepakatvāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:2311_2: brahmavaivarta ityasya uktatvādityadhyāhāreṇa nāsau śūdra ityanenānvayaḥ iti jñāyata
GSP33bbdip13u:2315: liṅgena svābhāvikarathena liṅgena bahudāyitvādiliṅgena cāsya pautrāyaṇasya kṣatriyatvāvagateḥ / asmāt bādhakāttadādravaṇānnimittādevāsya śūdratvam,
GSP33bbdip13u:2316: na tu jātyāsau śūdraḥ / tathā rathena vedaniścayācca nāsau śūdra iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2325_0: na talliṅgena śūdrasya vedādhikārasiddhiriti / na tadyuktaṃ - śūdrasyāpi rathitvasambhavāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:2325_1: na ca rathasya vedavyāpyatvācchūdre ca tadabhāvādrathasyāpyabhāva iti vācyam / śūdre
GSP33bbdip13u:2327: nānyeṣāmityāśaṅkāparihārāya pravṛttaṃ saṃskāraparāmarśādityaṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - aṣṭavarṣamiti / upanayīteteyanantaram ityupanayanamuktveti śeṣaḥ / 'tam';
GSP33bbdip13u:2328: upanītaṃ māṇavakamātma ācāryakaraṇakāmo 'dhyāpayītetyarthaḥ / itiśabdānantaraṃ śrutāviti śeṣaḥ / 'anyārthavacanaṃ parāmarśaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2332_1: iti mātraśabdārthaḥ / tathā ca noktaśaṅkāvakāśa iti bhāvaḥ / kecittu - śrutigatabrāhmaṇaśabdo
GSP33bbdip13u:2333_0: śaṅkāsamādhānānanuguṇatvāt / kuta evaṃ kalpyata ityataḥ smṛtāvapyupanayanākhyadvitīyajanmavata
GSP33bbdip13u:2333_1: eva sāraṇyaka vedādhyayanavidhānādityāśayena sūtre bhāṣye ca 'vedaḥ kṛtsno 'dhigantavyaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:2334: iti smṛtisamuccayārthakaścaśabdaḥ prāyoji / saḥ parāmarśādityanenānveti / parāmarśāccetyanantaram adhyayanasya saṃskārasāpekṣatvāvagamāditi śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2337: 'nāgnirna yajño na kriyā na saṃskāro na vratāniśūdrasya'; iti
GSP33bbdip13u:2340: nanvastvadhyayanasya upanayanasaṃskārasāpekṣatvaṃ, tathāpi na śūdrasya vedādhyayanābhāvasiddhiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2342: iti sūtrakhaṇḍaṃ vyācaṣṭe - nāgniriti // abhilāpāt abhidhānāditi / asya sūtre adhyāhṛtena 'na śūdrasya vedādhikāro,
GSP33bbdip13u:2343: na vā tadavinābhūtaṃ rathitvam'; iti sādhyenānvayaḥ / 'agniḥ',
GSP33bbdip13u:2349: uttamastrīṇāṃ tu na śūdravat / 'sapatnīṃ me parādhama'; ityādiṣvadhikāradarśanāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:2351_1: 'pi tāsāmadhikāre śūdrasyāpi tatprāptirityata āha - uttameti / tuśabdo vedadraṣṭṛtvākhyaviśeṣadyotakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2352: ityākṛṣyate / adhikārasyeti śeṣaḥ / uttamānāṃ striya iti vigrahaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2353: karmadhārayo vā / tathā ca śacī yamīūrvaśyādyuttamastrīṇāṃ śūdravanna saṃskārābhāvena vedavidyādhikārasyābhāvo vaktavyaḥ / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:2355: ityādividyāsu tāsāṃ taddraṣṭṛtvena adhikāradarśanāditi yojanā / atra 'sapatnīm';
GSP33bbdip13u:2359: iti samagravākyaṃ gṛhyate/ śacīvākyamidam / he bhagavān 'me sapatnīṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2366: sapatnīkleśāduttareyamiti śrutyarthaḥ / ādipadena 'udatī paśyavaḥ soma ekebhyaḥ parvate, ()
GSP33bbdip13u:2373_0: tarhi saṃskārābhāvahetoruttamastrīṣu vyabhicārassyādityata āha - saṃskāreti // abhāvo
GSP33bbdip13u:2373_1: vedādhikārasya / tuśabdaḥ pūrvoktanyāyasya sāmānyatvākhyaviśeṣadyotakaḥ / ukta iti
GSP33bbdip13u:2373_2: śeṣaḥ / tathā ca saṃskārābhāvena hetunā yatsūtre vedādhikārasya abhāva uktaḥ saḥ 'sāmānyena';
GSP33bbdip13u:2375_0: na tu nirapavādaniyamena / ato nāpavādaviṣaye vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ / sāmānyatvavacanena
GSP33bbdip13u:2375_1: śūdrapratibandī mocitā / tathā ca saṃskārābhāvena vedādhikārābhāva iti sāmānyavyāpteḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:2375_2: śacyādiṣu vidyādhikāradarśanākhyāpavādakena bhaṅge 'pi na śūdrādāvapi tasya bhaṅgaḥ kalpyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2380: strīṇāṃ pradānakarmaiva yathopanayanaṃ tathā / iti smṛteḥ // 36 //
GSP33bbdip13u:2382_0: evaṃ strīṇāṃ upanayanābhāve 'pi pūrvoktavyāpteḥ sāmānyatvena apavādasambhavādasti
GSP33bbdip13u:2383: strīṇāṃ kuta etadityata āha - strīṇāmiti / puṃsāmiti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca puṃsāṃ yathā upanayanaṃ saṃskāraḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2385_0: vivāhakriyaiva saṃskāra iti vyāsasmṛtyarthaḥ / smṛterityasya tāsāmityanenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2385_1: iti jñāyata iti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca uttamastrīṣviha hetūkṛtasya vidhipratinidhisādhāraṇasaṃskārasāmānyābhāvasyābhāvāt
GSP33bbdip13u:2385_2: na vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ / na ca saṃskāramātrasya vedādhikāraprayojakatve adhamastrīṇāmapi
GSP33bbdip13u:2385_3: tadāpattiriti vācyam / niṣedhābhāvasahitasyaiva tasya prayojakatvābhyupagamāt / nanvevamuttamastrīṇāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2385_4: saṃskārayuktatvādeva adhikāritvamiti noktanyāyabhaṅga iti vaktuṃ śakyatvāt,
GSP33bbdip13u:2386: kimarthaṃ tāsu saṃskārābhāvamaṅgīkṛtya uktanyāyasya sāpavādatvavacanamiti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip13u:2389_0: iti tacchabdena pūrvaprakṛtopanayanākhyasaṃskāramātrasya parāmarśādvedaḥ kṛtsna iti
GSP33bbdip13u:2389_1: smṛteścāsya śūdrasya tadabhāvābhilāpānnāgniriti śrutau saṃskārābhāvābhidhānāt na
GSP33bbdip13u:2389_2: tasya vedādhikāra iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2396: iti satyavacanena satyakāmasya śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇe hāridrumatasya 'naitadabrāhmaṇo vivaktumarhati'; (chāṃ.4.5.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2401_0: iti śrutau tu śūdrasya saṃskārābhāva evocyate na tu asau na kārya iti niṣidhyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:2401_1: ato na tadvirodho 'pītyāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - tadabhāveti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2403: tadākhyasya ṛṣeḥ etacca pūrvatrottaratra ca sambadhyate / 'satyavacanena satyakāmasya';
GSP33bbdip13u:2404_0: ityādinā sūtre tacchabdo vyastaḥ anekavibhaktikaḥ buddhyā vivicyāvartate ityuktaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2404_1: bhavati / śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇe cetyasya naitadbrāhmaṇa ityanena sambandhaḥ / co
GSP33bbdip13u:2404_5: ārjavavacanaṃ vāṅmanasayoravairūpyeṇa vacanaṃ vivaktuṃ nārhediti vipakṣe tarkoktirūpatayā,
GSP33bbdip13u:2405_0: yo 'brāhmaṇaḥ sa evaṃ vaktuṃ nārhati satyavacanahīna iti vyatirekavyāptyuktirūpatayā
GSP33bbdip13u:2405_1: vā śūdratvābhaāvanirṇāyakatvam / haridrumato 'patyaṃ hāridrumataḥ gautamaḥ / tasya
GSP33bbdip13u:2405_2: pravṛtteriti / asya na tadabhāva iti adhyāhṛtapadenānvayaḥ / tathā cetthaṃ mahāvākyayojanā
GSP33bbdip13u:2405_3: - satyakāmasya nāhametadvedeti satyavacanena naitadabrāhmaṇo vivaktumarhatīti vyatirekavyāptijñānena
GSP33bbdip13u:2405_4: bādhakatarkeṇa ca śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇe satyeva tamanumāyaiva tasya satyakāmasyopanayanasaṃskāre 'hāridrumatasya';
GSP33bbdip13u:2407_0: pravṛttatvāt na śūdrasya tadabhāvaḥ saṃskāraniṣedhābhāva iti / co hetusamuccaye /
GSP33bbdip13u:2407_1: anena - sūtre taditi vyastaṃ luptavibhaktikaṃ padaṃ samastaṃ ca tantreṇopāttam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2409: kintu saṃskāraniṣedhajñāpakaliṅgācceti samuccaye ca / netyasti / tadabhāva ityanuṣajyate / tathā ca 'tasya';
GSP33bbdip13u:2411_0: satyavacanena manovākkāyakarmaṇāṃ avaiparītyamārjavaṃ tadeva satyatvaṃ tādṛśavacanena
GSP33bbdip13u:2411_1: tena jñāpitena ṛjutveneti yāvat / naitadabrāhmaṇo vivaktumarhatīti vyatirekavyāptiṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2412: tasya śūdratvābhāvanirṇaye satyeva tadabhāvamanumāyaiva 'samidhaṃ somyāharopa tvāneṣye'; (chāṃ. 4.4.5.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2413_0: iti tasya tasminnupanayanasaṃskāre tasya gautamasya pravṛtterdarśanācca na śūdrasya
GSP33bbdip13u:2413_1: tadabhāvaḥ saṃskāraniṣedhābhāvaḥ / śūdrasya upanayananiṣedhābhāve kathamayaṃ tadabhāvanirdhāraṇe satyeva pravarteta,
GSP33bbdip13u:2414: te jñāyate niṣedho 'stīti bhāva iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2415: chāndogye hītthamākhyāyikā - satyakāmo nāma ṛṣiḥ jabālākhyaṃ mātaramupetyovāca / kimiti?
GSP33bbdip13u:2416: ahaṃ vedādhyayanārtham ācāryamupagaccheyaṃ tatrādhyayanasyopanayanasaṃskārasāpekṣatvāt upanayanaṃ vinā te māṃ nādhyāpayeyuḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2417_0: upanayanaṃ ca gotrādyavacane na kuryuḥ ato 'haṃ kiṃ gotro 'smi tadvadeti / evamuktā
GSP33bbdip13u:2417_1: jabālā svaputraṃ satyakāmamabravīt - he tāta tvaṃ yadgotro 'sītyetat nāhaṃ vedeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2418: he bhagavan brahmacaryārthaṃ tvāmupeyamiti / evamukto gautamaḥ he somya tvaṃ kiṃgotro 'si?
GSP33bbdip13u:2419: tadvadetyuvāca / evamuktassatyakāmaḥ punargautamaṃ pratyāha - nāhametadveda bho iti / bho bhagavan pūjya gautama ahaṃ yadgotro 'smītyetat vedyaṃ 'na veda';
GSP33bbdip13u:2420_0: na jānāmītyarthaḥ / evaṃ satyakāmasya satyavacanenārjavaṃ jñātvā punastaṃ pratyuvāca /
GSP33bbdip13u:2421: itiśrutivyākhyānarūpāyāṃ smṛtau brāhmaṇapratiyogitvena śūdrasyopādānāt / tathā ca 'etat';
GSP33bbdip13u:2425: na yogyaḥ / atastvamevaṃ vadan brāhmaṇa evāsi,
GSP33bbdip13u:2426: ato he somya samidhamupahara tvāmupaneṣya iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2435_1: anyathā tena devatādyadhikārasiddhirapi na syāditi śaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya
GSP33bbdip13u:2436: iti śrutyanusārādarthaśabdaḥ tadavadhāraṇaparaḥ / tathā ca 'śravaṇe trapujatubhyām';
GSP33bbdip13u:2437: iti śrutau śūdrasya vedaśravaṇādhyayanārthāvadhāraṇānāṃ pratiṣiddhatvādityarthaḥ / asya na tadabhāva ityanuṣaktasādhyenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2438_0: adhyayananiṣedhābhāva iti tadarthaḥ / tathā cāniṣiddhatve sati viśiṣṭabuddhyādimattvasyaiva
GSP33bbdip13u:2438_1: vedādhikāraprayojakatvenāṅgīkṛtatvāt tasya ca śūdre abhāvānna tasya devaprativandyā
GSP33bbdip13u:2438_2: vedādhikāro vācya iti bhāvaḥ / śūdreṇa vedaśravaṇe kṛte sati drutābhyāṃ trapujatubhyāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2438_3: vaṅgalākṣābhyāṃ tatkarṇavivaraparipūraṇaṃ rājabhaṭaiḥ kāryamiti śrutyarthaḥ / śiṣṭaḥ sugamaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2442: kevalaiva tu śuśrūṣā trivarṇānāṃ vidhīyate // iti smṛteśca /
GSP33bbdip13u:2444: śrutau śūdreṇa śravaṇe kṛte ityanuktervarṇabāhyaviṣayeyaṃ śrutiḥ kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkānivṛtyarthaṃ sūtre smṛteścetyuktaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2446_0: śūdreṇa nāgnissavathā ādhātavyaḥ pañcavidho yajño 'pi nānuṣṭheyaḥ / tathādhyayanaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2446_1: kutaḥ bhavet na kuto 'pi / tarhi tenānuṣṭheyaṃ paralokasādhanaṃ kimiti pṛcchati -
GSP33bbdip13u:2446_2: tu kintviti / uttaramāha - kevalaiveti / bhṛtirahitetyarthaḥ / trayaśca te varṇāśca trivarṇāḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2448_0: paricaryaiveti sambandhaḥ / vidhīyate / kāryatveneti śeṣaḥ / iti smṛterityasya śūdrasyaivādhyayananiṣedhāvagamāt
GSP33bbdip13u:2448_1: na tadabhāva ityadhyāhṛtenānvayaḥ / tathā ca spaṣṭasmṛtibalāt śruterapi śūdraviṣayatvameveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2454_0: nanu śūdrasya vedārthāvadhāraṇāderniṣiddhatve kathaṃ vidurādīnāṃ vaidikārthāvadhāraṇamasti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2454_1: evaṃ saṃskārarahitānāṃ vedānadhikāre kathaṃ kṣatriyaḥ saṃskārarahitaḥ karṇaḥ nikhilāḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:2454_2: śrutīradhijagau / na ca vācyamasāvapavādaviṣaya iti / avihitopanayanatve sati niṣiddhādhyayanānāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2454_4: āha - vidurādīnāmiti / ādipadena dharmavyādhādayo gṛhyante / tuśabdo viśeṣārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2455: asādhāraṇaḥ itaraśūdrādibhyo vyāvṛtto viśeṣaḥ teṣvastītyarthaḥ / yata iti śeṣaḥ / ato na 'nāgniḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2457: kintu apavādaviṣayatvameveti na tatpratibandyetaraśūdrāṇāṃ vedādhikāraḥ śaṅkya iti bhāvaḥ / sūtrārthastu - śūdrasya śravaṇe 'trapujatubhyām';
GSP33bbdip13u:2459: iti spaṣṭaṃ śūdrasyaiva vedādhyayananiṣedhakasmṛteśca na tasya tadabhāvo vedādhyayananiṣedhābhāva iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2464: yadidaṃ kiñca jagatsarvaṃ prāṇa ejati nissṛtam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2468: atrādhikaraṇe vajranāma samanvīyate / śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayādikaṃ sūcayati - yadidamiti // atra traivarṇikānāṃ vedāt brahmajñānaṃ mokṣadamiti pūrvoktamayuktam / yato 'yadidam';
GSP33bbdip13u:2469_0: iti śrutau udyatavajrajñānāt mokṣaḥ śrūyata iti vākyopaskāreṇa yojanā / anena pūrvādhikaraṇe
GSP33bbdip13u:2469_1: traivarṇikānāṃ vedāt brahmajñānaṃ mokṣadamiti yadabhipretaṃ tasya cānandamayādhikaraṇe 'netaraḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2470_1: saṅgatiruktā bhavati / vajraśabdo viṣaya iti sūcitam / vajraśruteḥ kuliśe rūḍhibalāt
GSP33bbdip13u:2472_0: iti śrutau ca āyudhe prasiddhodyatatvaliṅgabalāccendrāyudhamevedaṃ vajramiti sayuktikapūrvapakṣaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:2472_1: sūcitaḥ / śrutau prāṇa iti saptamyantaṃ padam / sthitamitiśeṣaḥ / prāṇa ityasya nimittasaptamītvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2472_2: vā vibhaktivipariṇāmaṃ vā āśritya āvṛttyā nissṛtamityanenāpi sambandhaḥ / yadityasyāvṛttiradhyāhāro
GSP33bbdip13u:2472_3: vā / yaditiśravaṇāt taditi labhyate / tathā cāyaṃ siddhānte śrutyarthaḥ - 'yatkiñca';
GSP33bbdip13u:2474: prāṇanānnimittāt prāṇaśabdavācye harau sthitaṃ prāṇānnissṛtaṃ tato jātaṃ ca taditaṃ sarvaṃ jagat 'yasmādejati';
GSP33bbdip13u:2483_0: muktāḥ bhavantīti / yadvā - prāṇa iti prathamāntaṃ padaṃ tathā ca prāṇo mukhyaprāṇaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2483_1: idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kiñcānyacchrutaṃ sarvaṃ jagacca yasmānnissṛtaṃ yasmādejati ca tadetadvajraṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2483_2: ye vidurityarthaḥ / athavā - yadityasyāvṛttistatra prathamasya jagadviśeṣaṇatvaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2485_0: tṛtīyasya vajraparatvam / sa iti labhyate / tasya prathamāntaprāṇapadenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2485_1: tathā ca yatkiñcijjagatsarvaṃ yadyasmānnissṛtaṃ sa mukhyaprāṇaḥ / yasmādejati tadvajraṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2485_2: ye vidurityarthaḥ / atra prathamavyākhyāne mukhyaprāṇasya jagadantargatatvena bhagavatpreryatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2486_0: tṛtīye tu mukhyaprāṇasyaiva sākṣādbhagavatpreryatvaṃ jagatastu mukhyaprāṇapreryatvamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:2486_1: bhedaḥ / pūrvapakṣī tu indrāyudhameva vajrapadenoktam / udyatatvamudyamanakarmatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2496_2: bhavati / na ca śrutau vākyabhedāṅgīkāre kampakatvaṃ vajre nocyata iti vācyam / kampakatvanimittabhayaṅkaratvasya
GSP33bbdip13u:2496_3: vajre abhidhānādvākyabhedāyogāt / udyatavajra iti sūtre śeṣoktiḥ samanvayasūtrādanuvṛttasya
GSP33bbdip13u:2496_5: sāvadhāraṇaṃ caitat / tena tuśabdārtho darśitaḥ / yadyapi vajro bhagavānevetyetāvadeva vaktavyaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2497: na tūdyata iti vajraviśeṣaṇamapi / tathāpi pūrvapakṣyuktodyatatvaliṅgasya prayatnavattvarūpodyatatvārthatayā sāvakāśatvajñāpanāya udyatetyuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2500: 'ko hyevānyātkaḥ prāṇyāt / yadeṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt'; (tai.2.7.) iti hi śrutiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2502_0: nanu śrutiliṅgābhyāṃ pūrvapakṣite kathaṃ liṅgamātreṇa nirṇaya ityato liṅgasya niravakāśatvādevetyāśayena
GSP33bbdip13u:2502_3: kohīti / hiśabdo hetau yata ityarthe prasiddhau vā / astīti śeṣaḥ / ato liṅgasya
GSP33bbdip13u:2507_0: yadā sāmānyataḥ sarvajagacceṣṭakatvameva viṣṇvekaniṣṭhaṃ tadā kimu vaktavyaṃ śruteḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:2507_2: jagacceṣṭakatvasya sarvathānyatrāyogāditi bhāvena tatra śrutiṃ darśayati - prāṇasyeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2507_3: co yasmādityarthe / pūrvaśrutisamuccaye vā / śrutirityanuṣajyate / uktaliṅgasya anyatra
GSP33bbdip13u:2507_4: niravakāśatvaṃ jñāpayatīti vākyaśeṣaḥ / yadvā - yat jagatpravartakaprāṇaceṣṭakatvādiliṅgaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2508: tasya viṣṇuniṣṭhatvāsiddhiparihārāya tatra śrutiṃ pramāṇayati - prāṇasyeti / 'prāṇasya';
GSP33bbdip13u:2517: kimutānyasya jagato yasya ceṣṭā nabhasvataḥ // iti ca skānde /
GSP33bbdip13u:2519: śruteḥ prathamavyākhyāyāmapi kaimutyavyaktikaraṇāya śrutyuktaprāṇaceṣṭakatvaṃ hetūkṛtya pravṛttāṃ smṛtimāha - nabhasvata iti // 'api';
GSP33bbdip13u:2522: jñānādiguṇapūrṇāddharerbhavanti / tadā kimutānyasya preryasya vāyubhinnasya jagataśceṣṭā harerbhavantīti vaktavyam / kuta etat?
GSP33bbdip13u:2523: yato yasya jagataḥ ceṣṭā nabhasvato na bhavantyata iti vacanārthaḥ / skānda ityanantaramuktamiti śeṣaḥ / ato 'pi liṅgasya nānyatrāvakāśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2527: khaṇḍanātsvaṅga evaiṣa hetināmā svayaṃ hariḥ / iti brahmāvaivarte // 39 //
GSP33bbdip13u:2530_1: prabalatvācca kathaṃ niravakāśenāpi sarvaceṣṭakatvaliṅgena vajro viṣṇureveti nirṇaya
GSP33bbdip13u:2532: saṃsāre jīvaparibhrāmakatvāt cakram / yathoktaṃ tattvapradīpe - caṅkrāmayatīti cakramiti / evaṃ 'varjanāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:2537: duṣṭāṅgacchedanāt damanācca khaḍga eṣa ityarthaḥ / evaśabdena tadabhedo vyāvartyate / tataḥ kim,
GSP33bbdip13u:2538: eṣa iti ca kaḥ ityata āha - hetīti / evaṃ hariḥ 'svayaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2540_0: hetīnāṃ cakrādisarvāyudhānāṃ yāni nāmāni mukhyavācyatayā tadvānityarthaḥ / hetīti
GSP33bbdip13u:2540_2: ityanantaram uktamiti śeṣaḥ / ato na śrutivirodho 'pīti bhāvaḥ / 'ucyate hetināmā';
GSP33bbdip13u:2541_0: ityanena vajrādiśabdānāṃ viṣṇau vidvadrūḍhirapyastīti sūcitam / tena varjanādityuktayogasya
GSP33bbdip13u:2541_1: rūḍherdairbalyāt ayoga iti nirastam / na caivaṃ kāṭhakabhāṣye - vajravadbhayadaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2541_2: ceti vajraśabdasya viṣṇau gauṇatvoktivirodha iti vācyam / tatra tadvākyasya yathākathañcit
GSP33bbdip13u:2541_3: brahmaparatvasiddhirityatraiva tātparyāt / brahmaparatvasya gauṇyāpi siddheḥ gauṇatve
GSP33bbdip13u:2541_4: tātparyābhāvāt / atra tu samanvayasūtrapratijñātamukhyārthatvāya tātparyato yogarūḍhyorevoktatvāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:2546: hṛdaya āhitaṃ jyotiḥ paramātmetyuktam / tatra 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjotiḥ puruṣaḥ'; (bṛ. 6.3.7.) iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2547: atra 'ubhau lokāvanusañcarati'; (bṛ.6.3.7.) iti vacanājjīva iti pratīyate iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2549: atrādhikaraṇe ubhayatraprasiddhajyotirnāma samanvīyate / śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayādikaṃ ca darśayati - hṛdaya iti / yaddhṛdaye 'āhitaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2550_0: nihitaṃ jyotiḥ tacchabdavācyaṃ sa paramātmeti jyotirnaye abhihitamityarthaḥ / tataḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:2550_1: kimityata āha - tatreti jyotirviṣaya ityarthaḥ / itiśabdātparaṃ śrūyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2550_2: tato 'pi kimityata āha - atreti / etadvākya ityarthaḥ / śrutaṃ jyotirityanuṣajyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:2550_3: tathā cātra śrutaṃ jyotiḥ tacchabdavācyo jñānātmako jīva eveti pratīyate / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:2553: iti vājasaneyavākyoktajyotiṣo viṣṇutvākṣepamukhena pūrvoktasyāpi tadākṣepāttenāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiḥ uktā bhavati / vājasaneyoktaṃ jyotirviṣayaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2554: jīva evedaṃ jyotiriti pūrvapakṣaśca sūcitaḥ / vājasaneyake hi ayaṃ puruṣaḥ 'kiṃjyotiḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2555: kiṃjñānasādhanaḥ jīvasya jñānasādhanaṃ kimiti janakena pṛṣṭo yājñyavalkyaḥ 'ādityajyotissamrāḍiti hovāca'; (bṛ. 6.3.2.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2557_0: sārvabhauma janakarāja ādityākhyajñānasādhanako 'yaṃ puruṣa ityuvāca / evaṃkrameṇa
GSP33bbdip13u:2560: iti jyotiṣṭvenokta ātmā katamaḥ kīdṛśa iti pṛṣṭo 'yo 'yam';
GSP33bbdip13u:2565: pūrṇaṣaḍguṇo'sti / so 'yamātmetyarthaḥ / tasya mahimānamāha - sa iti / 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2568: bhūlokadyulokau jāgratsuṣuptī vā pratijīvamādāya tamanusañcaratītyarthaḥ / pūrvapakṣī tu,
GSP33bbdip13u:2569: ātmapadaṃ sa iti padaṃ ca jīvaparaṃ ubhayalokasañcaraṇamapi karmādhīnaṃ vivakṣitaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2578: balaṃ viṣṇureva yaśo viṣṇurevānandaḥ'; iti darśanāccaturvedaśikhāyām /
GSP33bbdip13u:2581: siddhāntayatsūtramavatārya darśanapadoktaśrutyudāharaṇapūrvakaṃ vyācaṣṭe - ata iti / 'viṣṇureva jyotiḥ.... viṣṇurevānandaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2585: na jīva ityarthaḥ / viṣṇurevetyanena tattvityanuvṛttasya arthaḥ uktaḥ / śrutyarthastu spaṣṭaḥ / viśeṣastu - balaṃ balapradaḥ / 'sa vai balaṃ balināṃ cāpareṣām';
GSP33bbdip13u:2586: iti ca bhāgavate / viṣṇureva yaśaḥ 'tasya nāma mahadyaśaḥ'; (mahānā.1.10.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2587: iti śrutiriti tattvapradīpe abhihitam / brahmādiśabdavajjyotiśśabdo 'pi viṣṇvekaniṣṭha iti jñāpanāya samagravākyodāharaṇam / ata eva śrutāvevakāraḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2594: jyotirviṣṇuścettarhyubhayalokasaśraṇaliṅgavirodha iti śaṅkāmapi sautradarśanapadoktaśrutyā pariharati - prājñeneti // 'iti vacanāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:2596_1: na tadabhāva ityevaśabdārthaḥ / tathā ca liṅgaṃ sāvakāśamiti na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2597: prakarṣeṇa āsamantāt jñena prajña eva prājñaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2599: adhiṣṭhito jīvamāruhya gacchati bhagavāniti bṛhadbhāṣyokteḥ tadvāhanabhūtaḥ 'utsarjat';
GSP33bbdip13u:2610_0: atra ubhayatraprasiddhamākāśanāma brahmāṇi samanvīyate / śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayādikaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2610_1: ca darśayati - sarvādhāratvamiti / dyubhvādyadhikaraṇa iti śeṣaḥ / tataḥ kimityata
GSP33bbdip13u:2611_2: chandogaśrutyukta ākāśākhyo viṣayaśca sūcitaḥ / sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ darśayati
GSP33bbdip13u:2611_3: - vaināmeti // sa iti śeṣaḥ / co 'vadhāraṇe / tathā ca chandogyaśrutyuktaḥ ākāśaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:2612: ākāśapadena vaināmeti nipātadvayadyotitaprasiddhimadarthasyopadeśāt uktatvādityarthaḥ / kecittu - 'sattarkadīpāvalyāṃ prasiddho bhūtākāśa evāṅgīkāryaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2613_0: iti vacanāt avakāśasyāpi nāmarūpavattvāditi candrikākṛdabhipretaṃ ṭīkāpāṭhamāśritya
GSP33bbdip13u:2613_2: bhūtameva pūrvapakṣaviṣayaityāhuḥ / śrutau vai nāmeti nipātadvayaṃ prasiddhau / 'nāma';
GSP33bbdip13u:2618: bhedena / yaditi nāmarūpaprapañcādbhinnaṃ yadastīti yāvat / yadvā - tacchabdena vācyaprapañcāntarbhūtaṃ nīlādirūpaṃ vācakaṃ nāma ca gṛhyate/ tathā ca 'te';
GSP33bbdip13u:2620: vinā tadrahitamiti yāvat / sākalyena nāmavācyaṃ prākṛtarūparahitaṃ ca yadvartate tadbrahmetyarthaḥ / yadvā - 'te';
GSP33bbdip13u:2622: bhedena yadastītyarthaḥ / yathoktaṃ tattvapradīpe - nāmi ca rūpi ca yannabhavati tadbrahmeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2631_1: sūtre bhāṣye ca padārthatvabodhāyārthaśabdaḥ / śrutyanusārādantaraśabdaḥ / tābhyāmiti
GSP33bbdip13u:2631_2: śeṣaḥ / tathā ca tābhyāṃ nāmarūpābhyāṃ anyaḥ arthaḥ arthāntaraṃ yadvā tābhyāṃ vilakṣaṇaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:2631_3: arthaḥ arthāntaraḥ tasya bhāvastattvam / nāmarūpaprapañcabhinnatvaṃ vā prākṛtanāmarūparāhityaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2631_6: rūparāhityaṃ ādipadena nāmarāhityaṃ ca gṛhyate / tathā ca evaṃrūpārthāntaratvādyukterityarthaḥ / 'ākāśaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2632: chāndogye śruto 'yamākāśastacchabdavācyaḥ / samanvayasūtrādanuvṛttasya tattvityasyārthamāha - harireveti // anena - ayamākāśo harireva / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:2639_0: ākāśe śrutena nāmarūpatvādiliṅgena kuto viṣṇutvaniścaya ityatastasya tanniṣṭhatvāditibhāvena
GSP33bbdip13u:2639_1: tatra pramāṇatayā ātharvaṇīṃ śrutimāha - avarṇamiti / prākṛtaśuklādivarṇarahitaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2639_2: tadbhinnaṃ vetyarthaḥ / yadvā avarṇaṃ na varṇyaṃ 'nāpivarṇātmakam';
GSP33bbdip13u:2645_1: iti jñāyate ityadhyāhāreṇānvayaḥ / hi yasmāttasmāt na liṅgasya vyadhikaraṇāsiddhiriti
GSP33bbdip13u:2649: ityarūpaśrutiḥ / tathāpi vācakasya nāmno vācyāpekṣayāprādhānyāt vācyasyaiva pradhānatvādvācyaprapañcāntargatarūparāhityaśrutireva prathamamudāhṛtetyadoṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2656: sarvaśabdavācyatvāt rukmavarṇādirūpavattvācca / anyathār ikṣateḥ rūpopanyāsāccetyuktavirodhāpātādityata āha - anāmeti / 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2660: bhautikadehaśūnyatvāttādṛśarūparāhityādvā arūpa ityarthaḥ / iti brāhme ityasyoktatvāt noktavirodha ityadhyāhṛtenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2665: asaṅgatvaṃ paramātmana uktam / tacca 'sa yattatra kiñcitpaśyananvāgatastena bhavatyasaṅgo hyayaṃ puruṣaḥ'; (bṛ.6.3.15.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2668: atrādhikaraṇe svapnādidraṣṭṛtvaliṅgaṃ brahmaṇi samanvīyate / śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayādikaṃ ca sūcayati - asaṅgatvamiti / akṣaranayodāhṛte 'agandhamarasam';
GSP33bbdip13u:2670_0: tataḥ kimityata āha - tacceti / co 'vadhāraṇe / itīti evaṃrūpe vājasaneyavākya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2671: akṣaranayenāsya ākṣepikī saṅgatissūcitā/ svapnādidraṣṭṛtvākhyo viṣayaśca sūcitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2676: tataḥ kimityataḥ sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - sa ceti / co 'vadhāraṇe / 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2677: svapnādidraṣṭā / jīva eva bhavet / kutaḥ taddraṣṭṛtvasya loke jīva eva prasiddhatvādityarthaḥ / siddhānte śrutau 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2678: iti tacchabdena 'sa vā eṣa etasmin samprasāde ratvā caritvā dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ prati yonyā dravati svapnāyaiva'; (bṛ. 6.3.15.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2679: iti pūrvavākye prakṛtaḥ paramātmā parāmṛśyate / vaiśabdaḥ prasiddhau / samyakprasīdati jīvo 'syāmiti samprasādaḥ suptiḥ / tathā ca sa paramātmā 'samprasāde';
GSP33bbdip13u:2681: ramaṇaṃ kṛtvā jīvagataṃ puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca dṛṣṭvaiva na tvanubhūya 'caritvā';
GSP33bbdip13u:2691: asaṃspṛṣṭo bhavati / tatra hetuḥ - asaṅga iti / hi yasmādayaṃ puruṣaḥ 'asaṅgaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2693: tasmādityarthaḥ / pūrvapakṣī tu śrautatacchabdena jīvaṃ gṛhītvā sarvaṃ vākyaṃ jīvaparatayā vyākhyāti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2700: 'prājñenātmanā sampariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana veda nāntaram';
GSP33bbdip13u:2705_0: samādhatte / svapnādidraṣṭṛtvaṃ tasyaivetyatrāpi sambadhyate / tena sūtre uddeśyavidheyapratipattyartham
GSP33bbdip13u:2705_1: anuvṛttāvṛttasya tacchabdasya vipariṇāmassūcitaḥ / tacchabdena gṛhītasyāpi samanvetavyaliṅgasya
GSP33bbdip13u:2705_2: spaṣṭapratipattyarthaṃ svaśabdena nirdeśaḥ / itiśabdānantaraṃ suṣuptīti sautrapadaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2705_3: saṃyojyam / vyapadeśāditi buddhyā vivicya pūrvasmādanuṣaktaṃ padam / asaṅga ityapi
GSP33bbdip13u:2705_4: hetusūcanāya sūtre adhyāhṛtaṃ padam / jīvaḥ para ityanena suṣuptyutkrāntipadaṃ tatprakaraṇalakṣakamapi
GSP33bbdip13u:2705_5: jīvaparamātmaparamapītyuktaṃ bhavati / tathātve suṣuptiśabdaḥ kartari ktinnantaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2705_6: utkrāntiśabdaḥ dehādutkrāmayitṛparaḥ tathā cetthaṃ yojanā - svapnādidraṣṭṛtvaṃ tasya
GSP33bbdip13u:2705_7: paramātmana eva bhavet na jīvasya / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:2706_0: yato 'sāvasaṅgaḥ śrutaḥ / na ca svapnādidraṣṭuḥ asaṅgatvaśravaṇe 'pi kuto 'yaṃ viṣṇuriti
GSP33bbdip13u:2706_1: vācyam / yato 'yamasaṅgaḥ karmābaddhatvāt paraḥ paramātmaiva na jīvaḥ / tathā ca
GSP33bbdip13u:2706_2: liṅgasya niravakāśatvāt nāprayojakatvaṃ śaṅkyamiti bhāvaḥ / na ca jīve 'pir iśvarabhedena
GSP33bbdip13u:2706_4: iśvarājjīvasya bhedavyapadeśāditi / prājñeneti śrutyudāharaṇena sūtre suṣuptipadaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2707_0: tenāyaṃ bhedo vyāvahārika iti śaṅkānirāso 'pi bhavati / suṣuptyutkrāntipadena ca
GSP33bbdip13u:2707_1: tatprakaraṇaṃ lakṣyata ityuktaṃ bhavati / utkrāntipadaṃ ca jīvasya dehādutkramaṇarūpamaraṇavāci /
GSP33bbdip13u:2709: samāśliṣṭaḥ supto muktaśca dehādbāhyamāntaraṃ ca kiñcana viṣayādikaṃ na vedeti prathamavākyārthaḥ / dvitīyārthastu - prāktanādhikaraṇe 'bhihitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2715_0: nanu kathamaśarīrasya svāpnādidarśanaṃ yuktaṃ syādityata āha - svapnādīti / caśabdaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:2715_1: samuccaye / apyarthe vā / ādipadena jīvagatāvasthā gṛhyate / tathā ca na kevalamasaṅgatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2717: paramātmana eva jīvādapi mukhyato yujyate / ataḥ tasyaiva tadvacanaṃ yujyate na jīvasya/ kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:2719: satyāśeṣārthajñatvāt svapnapadārthānāṃ jīvagatāvasthāyāśca satyatāyā vakṣyamāṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ / na cāśarīratvaliṅgaṃ bādhakaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2720: yato 'tra tasyaiva ciccharīrakasyaiva svapnādidraṣṭṛtvamucyate / na ca 'dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca'; (bṛ.6.3.15.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2721_0: ityādyayoga iti vācyam / yato 'tra ādipadagṛhītaṃ puṇyapāpādidraṣṭṛtvaṃ liṅgāntaraṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2721_1: ca tasyaiva yujyate ata iti yojanā / tatropapattistu bṛhadbhāṣyādavagantavyā / anena
GSP33bbdip13u:2727_0: uktatvāt na tayorabhedaḥ / ato neśvarābhedenāpi jīve asaṅgatvoktiryujyate / kintu
GSP33bbdip13u:2727_1: tattu tasyaivar iśvarasyaiva yujyate / ata eva svapnādidraṣṭṛtvaṃ ca tasyaiva vaktuṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2727_2: yujyate na jīvasyeti sūtrārthaḥ ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2733: brāhmaṇasyāpi nityamahimā pratīyate / sa ca brāhmaṇaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:2735: ityajaśabdādviriñca iti prāptam / devānāṃ ca vidyākarmaṇoḥ padaprāptiḥ sūcitā taduparyapīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2737_0: atrādhikaraṇe brāhmaṇanāma samanvīyate / śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayādikaṃ ca sūcayati
GSP33bbdip13u:2737_1: - eṣa iti / itīti / vājasaneyakodāhṛtaṛṅmantra ityarthaḥ / na kevalaṃ viṣṇoḥ api
GSP33bbdip13u:2737_2: tu kasyacit brāhmaṇasyāpītyaperarthaḥ / idaṃ ca yo janmādyadhikaraṇeṣu viṣṇorananyāpekṣayā
GSP33bbdip13u:2738_0: iti vākye brāhmaṇasyāpi pratīyata iti yattacchabdādhyāhāreṇa yojyam / anena pūrvābhisaṃhitanityamahimatvasya
GSP33bbdip13u:2738_2: bhavati / tathā brāhmaṇākhyaviṣayo 'pi sūcitaḥ / yadvā - devānāmiti vākyaṃ devatādhikaraṇapratipādyānuvādaparatvenāpi
GSP33bbdip13u:2738_3: vyākhyāya tenāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā draṣṭavyā / tathā hi 'tadupari';
GSP33bbdip13u:2739: iti sūtreṇa devānāṃ viriñcādyamarāṇāṃ vidyākarmaṇossakāśāt sādhyā yā nityapadaprāptiruktā,
GSP33bbdip13u:2743_0: pratipādyata iti vākyayojanā / śrutau brahmaṇā vedenāṇyate 'vagamyate iti vyutpattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2743_1: dīrghavyatyāso viṣṇorvedagamyatve jīvādādhikyajñāpakaḥ / tathā ca brāhmaṇasya viṣṇoreṣaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:2745_0: śubhakarmaṇā tatphalena sukhena na vardhate / pāpakarmaṇā tatphalena duḥkhena na
GSP33bbdip13u:2745_1: hrasate iti śrutyarthaḥ / sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - sa iti / vājasaneyaśruta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2745_2: caśabdo 'vadhāraṇe / viriñca eveti sambadhyate / ityajaśabdāditi / ityevaṃ rūpeṣu
GSP33bbdip13u:2748_0: janmarahitaśceti śrutyarthaḥ / pūrvapakṣī tu brāhmaṇājaśabdavācyaṃ viriñciṃ manyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:2748_1: nanu kathaṃ brāhmaṇo viriñco bhavet / taduparīti sūtre devānāṃ vidyākarmabhyāṃ padaprāpteḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:2748_2: samarthitatvena brāhmaṇe śrutanityamahimatvasya viriñce asambhavāt / sādipadasyānityatvaniyamāt
GSP33bbdip13u:2748_3: ityata āha - devānāṃ ceti / co 'vadhāraṇe / itītyanantaraṃ sūtra iti śeṣaḥ / tathā
GSP33bbdip13u:2748_4: ca taduparīti sūtre viriñcetaradevānāmeva vidyākarmaṇoḥ sakāśāt padaprāptiḥ 'sūcitā';
GSP33bbdip13u:2749: samarthitā / na tu viriñcasyāpi / tasyeśvararūpatvena devakoṭyapraviṣṭatvādato viriñcasya nityamahimattvaṃ yuktameveti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:2756: 'sarvasyādhipatiḥ sarvasyeśānaḥ ... sa vā eṣa neti neti'; (bṛ. 6.4.21.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2760: brahmarudrādeḥ sakāśāt guṇairadhikaścāsau sarvasya patiḥ pālakaśceti sarvādhipatiḥ / 'sarvasya';
GSP33bbdip13u:2762: brahmādīnāṃ anaḥ preraka iti sarvasyeśāna iti śrutyantarārthaḥ / sarvavaśiśabdārthastu sarvamasya vaśe yasmāddhariḥ sarvavaśī tata iti bṛhadbhāṣyādavagantavyaḥ / 'sa vā eṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2768_0: kintu dṛṣṭaśrutavilakṣaṇa ityarthaḥ / vaiśabdaḥ prasiddhau / kuta ityataḥ 'ātmāgṛhyo
GSP33bbdip13u:2768_1: na hi gṛhyate 'śīryo na hi śīryate 'saṅgo na hi sajjate 'sito na vyathate na riṣyati.........sa
GSP33bbdip13u:2769_0: iti vākyaśeṣaḥ pravṛttaḥ / atrāgṛhya ityādirātmana iti netyuktārthe sākalyena agrāhyatvādirūpahetusamarpakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2769_1: na hītyādistu tatra pramāṇābhāvāditi hetusūcakaḥ / yadyapi bṛhadbhāṣye 'itina';
GSP33bbdip13u:2773_0: iti samākhyāśrutyanusārādevaṃ vyākhyātamityadoṣaḥ / ityādīti / ityādau śrutāḥ ye
GSP33bbdip13u:2774_1: evaṃ hetuṃ vyākhyāya sūtre samanvayasūtrāt tattvityanuvartya vipariṇamyamānena tadityanenānvayayogyamuddeśyasamarpakaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2774_2: nityamahimeti padaṃ cādhyāhṛtyāhatya niṣkṛṣṭāṃ pratijñāṃ darśayati - nityamahimeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2774_3: idaṃ ca phalakathanarūpam / śabdebhya iti hetvanvayayogyaṃ sādhyaṃ tu brāhmaṇa ityadhyāhṛtaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2774_4: draṣṭavyam / anena - ayaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ tattu viṣṇureva,
GSP33bbdip13u:2777: sarvādhipatyādivācisarvādhipatyādiśabdebhyo 'tra śrutebhyaḥ / tathā ca nityamahimāpi sa eveti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2782_0: nanu sarvādhipatyādivāciśabdasadbhāve 'pi kuto brāhmaṇasya viṣṇutvaniścaya ityaprayojakatavaśaṅkāvāraṇāya
GSP33bbdip13u:2782_1: tatra sarvādhipitvasya viṣṇvekaniṣṭhatve tāvacchrutimāha - uteti / idaṃ ca 'puruṣa evedaṃ sarvam';
GSP33bbdip13u:2792: iti vacanātsamudāyārthe tvapratyayaḥ / tattvapradīpe tu - bhāvabhavitrorabhedavyapadeśāt bhāve tvapratyayaḥ / 'amṛtatvasya';
GSP33bbdip13u:2793: mokṣasyar iśāna iti ceti arthāntaraṃ coktam / atra hetumāha - yaditi / tṛtīyā dvitīyārthe / tathā ca 'yat';
GSP33bbdip13u:2796: tasmādityarthaḥ / muktāvanadhīnatve sarvajñasya buddhimataḥ svādhīnasaṃsāribhyo mokṣapradānāyogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2800: (ṛ. 1.164.36.) 'sa yo 'to 'śrutaḥ'; (ai. ā. 3.2.4.) ityādiśrutibhyastasyaiva hi te śabdāḥ // 43 //
GSP33bbdip13u:2806_2: - sa iti / iyamapi sarvatrādhikaraṇe vyākhyātā / ityādītyādipadena sarvavaśitvādāvapyevameva
GSP33bbdip13u:2808: yasmātte sarvādhipatyādiśabdāḥ ityavagatāḥ tasmāt nāprayojakatvaṃ śaṅkyamiti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
